title: Performance Marketing Specialist (Meta + Google Ads) — Lead Generation for Solar AI Agency
description:
About the Role



I run an AI automation agency that helps solar installation businesses increase installs through:



lead conversion & follow-up automation



review & reputation growth



conversion optimisation systems



I am looking for a highly skilled performance marketer to manage end-to-end lead generation.



This role is not for beginners or general VAs.



I want someone who can:



? create campaigns

? write compelling ad creative & copy

? build funnels & landing pages

? optimise campaigns for qualified leads

? deliver consistent pipeline results



My goal is simple:



???? I receive qualified booked calls.

???? You manage everything that makes that happen.



Your Core Responsibilities

???? Campaign Strategy & Execution



Plan and launch Meta & Google Ads campaigns



Identify high-intent audiences



Test and scale winning campaigns



Continuously optimise performance



???? Ad Creative & Copy



Write high-converting ad copy



Develop scroll-stopping creative concepts



Manage creative testing and iteration



???? Funnel & Landing Page Optimisation



Build and optimise lead funnels



Improve conversion rates



Implement lead qualification steps



???? Lead Quality Optimisation



Filter low-quality leads



Improve targeting & messaging



Ensure leads meet qualification criteria



???? Reporting & Performance Tracking



Weekly performance summaries



Cost per lead & booked call metrics



Optimisation recommendations



Primary Objective



Deliver a consistent flow of qualified solar business owners booking calls.



This role is measured by:



? booked calls

? qualified prospects

? cost per acquisition

? campaign ROI



NOT clicks or impressions.



Ideal Candidate



You:



? have proven experience generating B2B leads

? understand Meta & Google Ads deeply

? know how to optimise for conversions (not vanity metrics)

? can build funnels & landing pages

? think strategically, not just tactically

? are data-driven and proactive

? require minimal supervision

? communicate clearly and professionally



Bonus If You Have Experience With



Solar industry marketing



AI / SaaS lead generation



Go High Level or similar CRM systems



Funnel optimisation



Conversion rate optimisation (CRO)



B2B service lead generation



What Success Looks Like



Within the first 60 days:



? consistent booked calls entering calendar

? improving cost per qualified lead

? optimised campaigns & funnel flow

? clear reporting & insights



Compensation



Please include:



1?? your monthly rate

2?? examples of campaigns you've managed

3?? cost-per-lead results you've achieved

4?? industries you've generated leads for



Performance bonuses available for strong results.



How to Apply



Include the following:



A short intro about your experience



Links or screenshots of past results



Your approach to generating qualified leads



The word SOLAR at the top of your application (to confirm attention to detail)



Important



This role is for someone who takes ownership and delivers results.



If you require step-by-step instruction for every task, this is not the role for you.

title: Recruiter in the Forex SPace
description:
Remote Business Development Partner (Forex / Trading Network Growth)



Company: GoldFlow

Location: Remote (Philippines preferred)

Type: Performance-Based | Long-Term Opportunity

Industry: Trading / Financial Markets 



About GoldFlow

GoldFlow is a fast-growing trading company specializing in high-probability Gold (XAUUSD) setups.

We operate through an international brokerage partnership structure and are currently expanding aggressively into the Asian market.

Our goal is simple:

Build a strong trading network across Asia and grow into a leading name within the gold trading space.

We are looking for ambitious individuals who want to grow with us and build a long-term income stream while working remotely.



The Role: Business Development Partner

Your main responsibility will be helping us grow our trading network in Asia.

You will:



• Connect with potential traders online

• Introduce them to GoldFlow

• Guide them through the onboarding process

• Maintain communication with your network

• Help build and grow your own client base



You do NOT need to:

• Create trading strategies

• Analyze charts

• Provide signals

• Handle technical trading work



Our team handles all trading operations, strategies, and infrastructure.

Your focus is purely on network growth and relationship building.



Compensation Structure:

This is a performance-based opportunity with strong income potential.

You earn commission based on trading volume generated by your network.

Realistic expectations:



You will receive:

- Your own IB number under our partnered broker

- A personal dashboard to track your network’s performance

- $4 commission per lot traded by clients under your IB

- Free access to all GoldFlow trades for your clients

- Free access to GoldFlow trades for yourself



Your income depends on the trading volume generated by the people in your network.

The more active traders you bring in, the more you earn.



For example:

- If your network generates 10 lots per day, you earn $40 per day

- That equals approximately $1,200 per month

- As your network grows, income between $1,000 and $1,500 per month is very achievable



There is no income cap. Earnings scale directly with the size and activity of your network.

Many partners can reach around $500 in their first month with consistent effort, while long-term growth can significantly increase earnings.





Growth Opportunity

GoldFlow is expanding into the Asian market, creating early-stage growth opportunities for committed partners.

High-performing individuals may have the opportunity to:



- Take on regional leadership roles

- Build and manage their own teams

- Grow alongside the company as it scales

We are building long-term infrastructure, not a short-term project.



Requirements:

- Strong English communication skills

- Comfortable communicating with clients online

- Self-motivated and performance-driven

- Reliable internet connection

- Experience in sales, Forex, online networking, or marketing is a plus

- Long-term mindset

No prior trading experience is required. Full guidance will be provided.





How to Apply:



Please send:

- A short introduction about yourself

- Any relevant experience

- Why you believe you are a strong fit for this opportunity

Selected applicants will be contacted for the next steps.

title: Executive Administrative Virtual Assistant

title: HIRING ASAP! Google Media Buyer (eCommerce)
description:
Help scale brands. Own performance. Drive real revenue.



GTE is a fast-growing global eCommerce company where great ideas don’t sit in slides — they turn into real, measurable growth. We build and scale online brands across international markets, and our tea
mbers take real ownership, grow fast, and help shape the future of the company.



We’re now looking for a performance-driven Google Ads Media Buyer to help take our main revenue channel to the next level.



Why This Role Matters

Google Ads drives around 90% of our total company revenue. That means your work won’t just “support marketing”, it will directly influence the growth of the entire business.



This role is perfect for someone who loves improving systems, scaling performance, and turning data into smarter decisions. You won’t just manage campaigns, you’ll help evolve the way we run Google Ads.



What You’ll Be Responsible For

From day one, you’ll have real ownership. Within your first 90 days, success in this role will mean:

- Developing and rolling out a new or significantly improved Google Ads strategy

- Restructuring and optimizing Google Shopping campaigns for stronger scalability and efficiency

- Driving measurable performance improvements, targeting a 20%+ increase in revenue from Google Ads

- Using performance data to continuously refine bidding strategies, campaign structure, and product feed performance



Your goal is simple: turn ad spend into scalable, profitable growth.



We’re excited to work with someone who:

- Has at least 3 years of hands-on experience in performance marketing or media buying

- Has direct experience running Google Shopping campaigns for large eCommerce catalogs (10,000+ products)

- Has managed high-budget ad accounts ($300K+ per month)

- Is highly proficient in Google Ads, Google Merchant Center, and Google Analytics

- Ideally has experience with Google CSS Labelizer

- Thinks analytically and uses data to drive decisions, not guesswork

- Enjoys testing, optimizing, and uncovering performance opportunities others might miss

- Is comfortable taking full ownership of results and being accountable for revenue impact



Hiring Process

As part of our process, shortlisted candidates will complete a 19-minute Google Ads knowledge assessment. This helps us understand your hands-on expertise before moving forward to the HR interview stage.





Ready to Grow With Us?

If you’re looking for a role where your work matters, your growth is supported, and your impact is visible — we’d love to hear from you.

title: Product Researcher & Lister & Store Builder - Full-Time Position
description:
Full application here







Remote Ecom Operator (Dropshipping) — Run the Full Playbook End-to-End



SOPS please read before hand.















## Remote Ecom Operator (Dropshipping) — Run the Full Playbook End-to-End



We’re hiring a **hands-on, end-to-end dropshipping operator** to execute our complete operating system from **niche selection product research  supplier sourcing  store build  ads testing  fulfillment. This is not a “VA” role—this is an **owner-operator** style execution seat using a defined SOP playbook. 



### What you’ll be responsible for (end-to-end)



#### 1) Niche selection & market validation



* Use a structured niche scoring + validation process (Reddit + Google Trends + Amazon + TikTok signals) to pick testable niches. 



#### 2) Product research & competitor intelligence



* Run winning-product research using spy tools + checklists (e.g., Minea/PiPiADS + validation criteria). 

* Build product test shortlists, document competitors, extract angles/hooks, and recommend go/no-go decisions.



#### 3) Supplier sourcing, vetting & backup suppliers



* Source suppliers (CJ/AutoDS/Zendrop/Spocket/AliExpress/Alibaba as needed), vet with clear standards, and maintain **at least 2 suppliers per winning product**. 

* Confirm shipping methods/timelines and ensure policy-safe claims + realistic customer expectations.



#### 4) Shopify store build & conversion optimization



* Build/optimize Shopify store(s): theme setup, required apps, product pages, pricing, trust elements, FAQs, upsells. 

* Maintain mobile-first performance and clean customer journey (product page ? checkout ? post-purchase).



#### 5) Paid ads launch, testing & optimization (TikTok + Meta)



* Launch tests using structured testing protocols (budgeting, ad group structure, creative requirements, kill/scale rules). 

* Install pixels Day 1, monitor key metrics daily, iterate creatives fast, and pivot when data says so. 



---



## Systems & deliverables (how we work)



You will document and manage execution so work is “handoff-ready” and repeatable:



* Maintain product records, tasks, and structured research/decision packets (R0R3 style gates are a plus). 

* Keep organized folders and clear handoffs for creatives, store assets, suppliers, and performance reporting.



---



## Required experience



* Proven track record running **Shopify dropshipping or DTC testing** end-to-end (not just one slice like “product research” or “customer support”).

* Strong paid ads fundamentals: TikTok Ads + Meta Ads (testing structure, reading metrics, creative iteration, scaling decisions). 

* Comfortable owning operations: supplier coordination, fulfillment workflows, support processes, and refund/chargeback prevention. 





### Tools you are required to have and know how to use (At least 2)



Minea, PiPiADS, Meta Ad Library, Kalodata, Winning Hunter 

---



## What success looks like (core KPIs)



You will be measured on:



* Speed to launch: consistent product testing cadence (weekly/biweekly depending on scope).

* Store health: conversion rate trends, AOV improvements via upsells, refund rate control. 



---



## Role details



* **Remote / online**

* **Type:** Contract (with potential to grow into long-term operator role)

* **Hours:** Full-time 35–45 hrs/week]



  * Hourly: $1 to start

  * Performance bonus: $200 per winning product and funnel tied to net profit milestones (preferred for senior operators)



---



## How to apply



Send:



1. A short summary of your relevant wins (store results, ad spend levels, ROAS ranges, niches).

2. Links or screenshots: ad dashboards, store examples, creative examples



### Screening questions (answer in your application)



* What’s your step-by-step process to find and validate a product before spending on ads?

* Walk us through how you structure a $50/day TikTok test and what metrics d
 “kill” vs “keep.” 

* What’s your approach to reducing refunds/chargebacks in dropshipping? 

* What core
 flows do you launch first and why? 

* What tools from this stack have you personally used? 

* Full Understanding to the inital Compensation of 1USD base and 200 USD Per Validated Store/Product

* A fun fact about yourself so we know this was not written with AI

title: Health eCommerce Creative Strategist
description:
*** DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DON'T HAVE:***

- EXPERIENCE WITH SUPPLEMENT 



NOTE: SPAMMERS WILL BE REPORTED



_________________

We are a fast-growing premium supplement brand focused on science-backed formulations, longevity, and performance optimization. Our mission is to build category-defining products supported by strong education, compelling storytelling, and high-converting creative.



We are now looking for a Creative Strategist with proven supplement experience who understands how to translate health science into persuasive, compliant, high-performing ad creatives.



This is not an entry-level role. We are looking for someone who has already built and scaled winning campaigns in the supplement space.



Role Overview



As our Creative Strategist, you will own the ideation and direction of performance-driven ad creatives across Meta, (maybe TikTok, YouTube, and other paid channels in the future)



You must understand:



• Supplement consumer psychology

• Compliance limitations in health claims

• UGC scripting and hooks

• Direct response frameworks

• Performance metrics such as CTR, thumb stop rate, CPA, and ROAS



Your job is simple in theory and demanding in execution: develop creatives that convert.



Responsibilities



• Develop high-converting ad concepts based on data and competitor research

• Write scroll-stopping hooks and scripts for UGC and founder ads

• Build creative briefs for video editors and content creators

• Analyze ad performance and iterate quickly

• Identify winning angles and scale them

• Conduct competitive analysis within the supplement space

• Align creative with brand positioning and long-term growth strategy



Requirements



• Proven experience working with supplement brands (mandatory)

• Demonstrated track record of winning ad creatives

• Strong understanding of Meta and TikTok ad ecosystems

• Ability to balance compliance with persuasive messaging

• Experience scaling offers such as subscriptions, bundles, or AOV lifts

• Data-driven mindset



Application Requirements:



To be considered, you must submit:

1. Portfolio of previous supplement brands you’ve worked with

2. Examples of winning ads (video links preferred)

3. Performance metrics where possible (CPA, ROAS, CTR, etc.)

4. Brief explanation of why the creatives worked

5. Your availability and rate



Applications without supplement experience will not be considered.



What We Offer



• Fast-moving team with strong growth ambitions

• Long-term opportunity with performance upside

• Freedom to test bold ideas backed by data

• Collaborative, execution-focused culture



If you understand how to sell supplements without sounding like everyone else in the market, we want to hear from you.



Apply by sending your portfolio and best performing creatives.

title: Ecommerce UGC Ads Video Editor (TikTok / Reels / Shorts) -Dropshipping
description:
Full application here







SALARY



150$ monthly base retainer

Plus 50 USD bonus per validated product



POSITION



FULL Time, long-term, remote

US-based ecommerce brand using a high-volume testing model (CaniCol v2.2)



ABOUT THE ROLE



We are building a creative engine where volume and speed matter. Our CaniCol model tests many products every month using strict rules and lean budgets. Creatives are the main fuel.



We are hiring one dedicated video editor to turn existing assets into short-form ads for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.





You will work only with existing footage, b-roll, product clips, images, reviews, ad library downloads, and AI tools. Your goal is to produce 100 ads per month that give us enough shots on goal to find winning products.



This role is ideal if you like high-output work, clear targets, and long-term stability.



ABOUT US AND THE CANICOL MODEL



We run a lean, volume-based dropshipping system. We test many products each month and make decisions fast based on data.



Our model focuses on:

Fast product testing with controlled budgets

High volume of creatives per product

Clear kill, pass, and scale rules

Accepting some false negatives in exchange for more total tests



Your edits plug directly into this engine. Your ads are what we run in Phase 1 and Phase 2 tests. When a product reaches validated status using your creatives, you earn a bonus. This aligns your work with our real goal: validated products and profitable campaigns.



We work with Slack, ClickUp or Notion, and Google Drive. You will receive clear briefs and assets, and we will give feedback based on real ad performance such as hook rate and click through rate.



MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES



You will edit 100 short-form video ads per month. Each video is usually 15 to 35 seconds, vertical 9:16 format, for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts.



You will work only from existing assets. Examples include competitor ads from TikTok and Meta Ad Libraries, supplier or manufacturer videos, product b-roll, product photos, customer reviews, screenshots, stock clips, and AI generated or AI assisted clips.



You will create multiple variations from the same base assets. This means trying different hooks in the first 1 to 3 seconds, different scene order and pacing, and different angles and calls to action.



You will add strong direct response elements. This includes clear on screen text, readable subtitles, benefit driven captions, problem and solution framing, social proof, and urgency when appropriate.



You will export files correctly and keep all files named and organized following our structure in Google Drive.



You will make fast revisions when we see what is working and what is not. When a product shows good signals, we will ask you for more variations quickly so we can push it through the CaniCol gates.



REQUIRED SKILLS



You must have experience editing short-form vertical videos for platforms such as TikTok, Instagram Reels, or YouTube Shorts.



You must be able to edit using at least one of the following: CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve.



You must understand pacing and hooks. You know that the first 1 to 3 seconds d
 whether people keep watching or scroll.



You must be comfortable working completely from existing footage and from AI tools. This is an editing and repurposing role, not a filming role.



You must be able to create clean subtitles and on-screen text in clear English.



You must have a reliable computer and stable internet connection that can handle video editing work.



SOFT SKILLS WE VALUE



You follow instructions very carefully and care about details such as file names and structure.



You hit deadlines and weekly output targets without needing to be chased.



You are open to direct feedback and can adjust your style based on performance data and comments.



You ask questions when something is unclear instead of guessing and wasting time.



You want a long-term, stable role and are not just looking for a quick project.



COMPENSATION AND GROWTH



Pay is 150USD per month retainer in exchange for 80 edited short-form ads for the first month. After proven, retainer will increase.



You also receive a 50 USD bonus for each validated product. A product is considered validated when campaigns using your creatives hit our internal performance targets over several days at proper ad spend. We will share these rules clearly in writing so you know exactly what has to happen for a product to count as validated.



As your creatives help us find more winning products, we will review your base pay and bonus structure. There is potential for higher pay and for you to become a lead editor in the future.



We pay on time and review performance regularly.



WORK SCHEDULE AND SETUP



This is a part-time, long-term, remote role.



You can set your own schedule as long as you consistently deliver your weekly output and can overlap at least 2 to 3 hours with US Eastern Time on agreed days for feedback calls or messages.



You will use Slack for communication, Google Drive for assets and exports, and ClickUp or Notion for tasks. You will use your own editing software.



HOW TO APPLY



OnlineJobs.ph subject line requirement:



Use this exact subject line when you apply:

BLUE – Short-Form Ads Video Editor



In the body of your application, include the following in plain text:



First, a short introduction of 3 to 5 sentences. Tell us who you are, your experience with short-form ads, and why a high volume, repurposing focused role like this fits you.



Second, links to 3 to 6 examples of your work. These should be vertical short-form videos. Ad style edits are preferred. You can send Google Drive links, TikTok or Instagram profiles, or YouTube links. If any of these performed well in terms of views or sales, mention that.



Third, answer these questions in simple text:

What editing software do you use every day?

How many 15 to 30 second ads can you realistically edit in a full working day at good quality?

Have you worked with ecommerce, dropshipping, or DTC brands before? If yes, what did you do?

Have you used TikTok or Meta Ad Library before to study or repurpose ads?

Are you comfortable with 150$ per month base pay plus 50 USD per validated product and an output of 80-100 ads per month?



Fourth, describe your setup. Write your computer specs including CPU, RAM, and GPU if you have one. Also tell us your internet speed. You can paste your speedtest result if you want.



Fifth, optional but a big plus. You may send a 1 to 2 minute Loom or unlisted YouTube video where you show one ad you edited and explain how you built the hook, the middle, and the call to action.



HIRING PROCESS



We will first review applications that follow all instructions and use the correct subject line.



We will then shortlist candidates based on portfolio, clarity of answers, and fit for a high-volume testing environment.



Shortlisted candidates will be invited to a paid test project using our assets.



After the test project, we will choose one editor for a one month paid trial. If both sides are happy after the trial, we will continue on a long-term basis.



If you want a long-term, data driven editing role where your work is directly tied to validated products and bonuses, we invite you to apply.

title: Executive Virtual Assistant | Multi-Company Business Development Support
description:
About the Role

I run a portfolio of four companies across branding, defence advisory, healthcare infrastructure, and software/AI. I need a sharp, self-directed VA to own the operational layer of business development across all four. This is not a data entry role. You will be the engine behind LinkedIn outreach, CRM pipeline management, meeting coordination,
 drafting, cold outreach campaigns, and research. You will work directly with me and my PA.

I use AI tools (Claude) extensively and expect you to as well. If you've never used AI tools in your workflow, this isn't the right fit. If you've used them and found they make you faster and better, keep reading.



What You Will Do Every Day

- Build targeted prospect lists using Claude AI and research tools, then execute LinkedIn outreach under my account (with strict safety protocols).

- Manage our Airtable CRM: create origination entries, move contacts through the pipeline, coordinate with my PA on meeting scheduling, and create deals when opportunities arise.

- Draft
s and follow-ups in my voice and tone. You'll be trained on my writing style and expected to match it closely.

 - Run structured cold outreach campaigns end-to-end: list building, template drafting, sending, tracking, and follow-up sequences.

- Deliver daily output logs with specific activity numbers. No tracking software. Your outputs speak for themselves.



What I Need From You

- Proven VA experience supporting a founder, CEO, or senior executive. Not a team. Not a department. A person who moves fast and expects you to keep up.

- Airtable proficiency (or the ability to learn it in days, not weeks). If you've built automations in Airtable before, say so. If you haven't but you've done similar work in 
, HubSpot, or another CRM, that counts.

- LinkedIn outreach experience. You understand connection limits, the importance of VPN/dedicated IP, and how to write messages that don't sound like spam.

- Strong written English. Not perfect grammar for the sake of it. I need you to write
s that sound like a real person, not a template. Warm, direct, professional.

- AI tool literacy. You use ChatGPT, Claude, or similar tools proactively in your work. Bonus if you've used Claude's Co-Worker/Projects features.

- Judgment. You know the difference between something you can handle yourself, something you should flag, and something that needs to be escalated immediately.



What I Need From You

- Proven VA experience supporting a founder, CEO, or senior executive. Not a team. Not a department. A person who moves fast and expects you to keep up.

- Airtable proficiency (or the ability to learn it in days, not weeks). If you've built automations in Airtable before, say so. If you haven't but you've done similar work in 
, HubSpot, or another CRM, that counts.

- LinkedIn outreach experience. You understand connection limits, the importance of VPN/dedicated IP, and how to write messages that don't sound like spam.

- Strong written English. Not perfect grammar for the sake of it. I need you to write
s that sound like a real person, not a template. Warm, direct, professional.

- AI tool literacy. You use ChatGPT, Claude, or similar tools proactively in your work. Bonus if you've used Claude's Co-Worker/Projects features.

- Judgment. You know the difference between something you can handle yourself, something you should flag, and something that needs to be escalated immediately.



How to Apply

- Do not send a generic cover letter. Instead, reply with the following:

- Your name and a one-paragraph summary of the most relevant VA role you've held. Specifically tell me: who you supported (founder/CEO/team), what tools you used daily, and one example of a task you owned end-to-end without needing to be managed.

- Rate your Airtable proficiency from 1 to 10 and explain your rating in one sentence.

- Rate your LinkedIn outreach experience from 1 to 10 and explain your rating in one sentence.

- Have you used Claude AI (by Anthropic) before? If yes, describe one task you used it for. If no, that's fine, but say so.

Include the phrase "I read the full posting" at the very start of your application, before anything else. Applications without this will not be reviewed.

About PropFix.ie



PropFix.ie is Ireland's trusted property maintenance specialist, offering comprehensive solutions with years of expertise across the construction and renovation sectors. We transform spaces through our diverse range of services, from handyman solutions and office fit-outs to complete renovations, house extensions, and specialized installations including doors, floors, and partitions.



Our commitment to delivering the best value property maintenance has established us as a reliable partner for residential and commercial clients nationwide. With decades of experience, including 50 years of expertise in garage conversions, we pride ourselves on impeccable craftsmanship, turning our clients' visions into reality while ensuring their properties remain in top condition.



Role Overview

We are seeking a detail-oriented Mechanical Engineer to join our dynamic team. This role combines technical expertise with project coordination, focusing on metal fabrication design, cost estimation, and project delivery. The successful candidate will work closely with our sales, procurement, and installation teams to ensure seamless project execution from concept to completion.



Key Responsibilities

Design & Technical Work



AutoCAD 2D/3D Drawings: Prepare and edit precise design drawings for industrial door installations.

Technical Documentation: Maintain comprehensive technical drawings, specifications, and project records.

Design Support: Assist in custom design adjustments to meet specific project requirements.

Quality Control: Review all drawings for accuracy, compliance, and adherence to industry standards.

SolidWorks Expertise: Model, simulate, and optimize metal fabrication components.



Project Management & Coordination



Job Pricing: Conduct detailed cost estimation and quantity surveying work for projects

Material Take-off: Identify and quantify material requirements with precision

Project Coordination: Support project scheduling and timeline management

Reporting: Provide regular progress updates and comprehensive cost reports



Procurement & Client Management



Material Ordering: Coordinate purchasing activities and maintain effective supplier communication

Supplier Coordination: Manage procurement processes and vendor relationships

CRM Updates: Maintain accurate client and project data in our CRM system



Required Skills & Experience

Technical Requirements



AutoCAD Proficiency: Advanced skills in both 2D & 3D AutoCAD applications

Industry Knowledge: Experience with construction and industrial door systems

Quantity Surveying: Proven experience in cost estimation and QS methodologies

Analytical Skills: Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail



Professional Skills



Supplier Management: Experience in procurement and supplier coordination

CRM Systems: Familiarity with customer relationship management platforms

Organization: Exceptional organizational skills with ability to manage multiple projects

Communication: Strong written and verbal communication skills



What We Offer

Competitive salary package

Opportunity to work with cutting-edge industrial door technologies

Professional development and training opportunities

Collaborative and supportive work environment

Career growth potential within an expanding company

Involvement in diverse and challenging projects across Ireland

title: VIDEO EDITOR
description:
About the Job:

We're a hair education brand looking for a skilled video editor to transform 10 professionally recorded full-length haircut tutorial videos into engaging short-form content for Instagram Reels and TikTok. You'll be responsible for repurposing this footage into a variety of content formats including before & after reveals, tips & tricks clips, full process breakdowns, satisfying transformations, and trending-style edits. The goal is to create scroll-stopping content that educates and entertains, helping us grow our audience across social platforms. This is an ongoing remote position with potential for long-term collaboration as we produce more content.



Ideal Candidate:

You're someone who lives and breathes short-form video. You understand what makes people stop scrolling on TikTok and Reels, and you know how to structure a 15–60 second clip for maximum engagement. You have experience editing beauty, grooming, or education content and can take raw tutorial footage and turn it into multiple unique pieces without being told exactly what to do you bring creative ideas to the table. You stay on top of trends, know how to use text overlays, captions, sound design, and pacing to keep viewers hooked, and you take pride in delivering polished work on time.



Job Requirements:

Proven experience editing short-form content for TikTok and/or Instagram Reels (portfolio or samples required)

Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, CapCut, or DaVinci Resolve

Strong understanding of social media trends, hooks, transitions, and pacing for short-form video

Ability to add captions, text overlays, sound effects, and music in a clean, professional way

Experience repurposing long-form content into multiple short-form clips

Reliable internet connection and ability to handle large video files remotely

Strong communication skills and ability to meet deadlines consistently

Experience in the beauty, barbering, or hair education niche is a plus but not required



Hiring Process:

To ensure we find the right fit, shortlisted candidates will receive one sample video from our library. You'll be asked to create a short-form edit (Reel or TikTok style) using that footage to showcase your creativity, editing skills, and understanding of our content style. The final hiring decision will be based on the quality of your sample edit. This is your chance to impress us, show us what you can do!

title: Executive Assistant to C-Level Executives
description:
Are you the kind of operator who brings order to chaos, anticipates needs before they arise, and keeps executives running at peak performance?



We’re on the hunt for a high-impact, razor-sharp Executive Assistant to partner directly with our C-suite leadership. If you thrive in fast-paced environments, love owning outcomes, and take pride in being the force behind the force, this role is for you.



You won’t just manage calendars, you’ll power executive productivity, streamline operations, and serve as the backbone of the executive office.





What You’ll Own



Executive calendar & meeting orchestration

Reports, presentations & business documents

Billing support: hours tracking, expenses & invoicing

Travel planning & logistics coordination

If you’re a detail-obsessed, systems-loving, executive enabler ready to make a real impact, we’d love to connect. Fill out the application form and let’s start your career journey with us!

title: Operations Virtual Assistant
description:
Note: Interested applicants must submit their application exclusively through the OnlineJobs platform. Do not
 the company directly. Any candidate who contacts the company outside of the OnlineJobs system will be disqualified from consideration.



Operations Virtual Assistant

(Process-Driven | High-Precision | Behind-the-Scenes Operations)



Job Overview



Maid In America Cleaning Services is hiring an Operations Virtual Assistant to protect schedule integrity, data accuracy, and operational consistency.



This is a behind-the-scenes execution role. You will not be customer-facing. You will work inside defined systems and SOPs to ensure our operational engine runs cleanly and efficiently every day.



If you enjoy structured work, moving quickly without sacrificing accuracy, and taking pride in clean execution, this role will feel natural to you.



What You’ll Do:



1. Scheduling & Job Management (Primary Responsibility)

You will own scheduling preparation and system accuracy for our TN locations.



This includes:

- Creating and modifying clients, jobs, and visits in Jobber

- Preparing future-day schedules for review and approval

- Creating training tasks in Jobber for new tea
mbers

- Re-sequencing jobs and rebalancing teams within defined guardrails

- Maintaining week-to-week schedule consistency whenever possible

- Flagging and correcting conflicts or inefficiencies early

- Executing same-day scheduling adjustments exactly as directed



2. Data Accuracy & System Integrity

You will ensure operational data is accurate, complete, and reliable.



This includes:

- Updating customer notes, job frequencies, and service details

- Invoicing customers promptly after service completion

- Calculating cost-of-service data after jobs

- Preparing timesheet and tips reports for payroll

- Logging complaints and rectified cleans accurately

- Creating and publishing weekly operational reports

- Manual KPI data entry

- Verifying work-to-labor ratios using company tools



3. Administrative Support

You will support operational structure and remove administrative friction.



This includes:

- Supporting the Assistant Operations Manager with administrative execution

- Maintaining internal trackers and shared documents

- Following established documentation and checklists consistently



What This Role Requires

- High pace with high accuracy

- Comfort with structured, repeatable tasks

- Strong attention to detail

- Clear communication when issues arise

- Strong adherence defined systems and guardrails

- Ability to work independently within clear expectations



This role involves a high volume of operational tasks that must be completed correctly and consistently. As the company grows, volume will increase — and this role grows with it.



Who We’re Looking For



Detail-Oriented & Reliable

You take pride in doing things correctly and thoroughly.



High Throughput Executor

You can handle volume without losing structure or focus.



Process-Driven

You work well inside defined systems and appreciate clear expectations.



Accountable Communicator

You flag issues early, own mistakes quickly, and ask for clarification when needed.



Tech-Comfortable

You’re comfortable using tools like Slack, Google Suite, Chrome extensions, and scheduling platforms. Experience with Jobber is a strong plus.



Experienced in Fast-Paced Admin or Scheduling

Background in administrative, dispatch, logistics, scheduling, or operations-heavy roles is

preferred.



Work Requirements

- Monday–Friday, 8AM–5PM U.S. Central Time

- Reliable internet with backup

- Dedicated workspace

- Backup power options in case of outages

- Fluent written English



Our Core Values

- Communication

- Connection

- Quality

- Service

- Teamwork



If these values resonate with you, we want to hear from you.



Important Screening Step (Read Carefully)



SERIOUS APPLICANTS ONLY:

1. Complete our Culture Index survey: 

2. Submit your application with the subject line beginning with the core value you most resonate with (ALL CAPS).

3. Use a minimum of 5 Apply Points when applying

4. In your application message, include one sentence describing the most repetitive task you have performed at a high standard for 6+ months.



Applications that do not follow all instructions will not be reviewed.

title: Productlister Shopify ( Fashion)

-Writing and optimizing product descriptions (conversion-focused and accurate)

-Using Claude AI to create and improve product content

-Checking listings for errors, consistency, and overall quality

-Actively contributing ideas to improve the product listing process

-Following clear SOPs and optimizing them when necessary

-Proven experience in fashion dropshipping (extensive hands-on experience with this model)

-Strong experience with Shopify (you know the platform inside and out)

-Experience using AI tools for content creation

-Highly organized, proactive, and results-driven

-Able to work independently and make decisions

-Strong attention to detail and high quality standards

-Available full-time with a long-term focus

-Leadership experience is not required but is considered a plus.



???? Who We Are Looking For



-We are looking for someone who takes ownership of the product listing process and wants to be fully responsible for it. You follow SOPs carefully but are also confident enough to suggest improvements.



You are comfortable with:



Working independently



Taking responsibility



Maintaining high standards



Holding yourself accountable



Making decisions within your role



If you are ambitious and consistently deliver quality work, there are growth opportunities within the company.



???? Application Instructions

Additionally, answer the following questions in writing (not in your video):

Are you currently working another job?



When are you available to start?



We look forward to your application.



Best regards,

Alex

title: Expert E-Commerce VA & AI Obsessed
description:
About Us:

We are Lairos – a fast-growing, premium DTC brand based in the US. We transfor
dical necessities into empowering choices by creating specialized knee-high socks for children who wear AFO braces.



We are obsessed with AI. We use it to move faster, work smarter, and scale. Whoever joins us will become an absolute AI Master. As part of this role, you will be given access to Gemini Pro to help you execute your tasks. We expect you to be highly independent, know how to prompt effectively, and use AI to solve problems on your own.



The Role (20 Hours/Week | Flexible Hours):

You can work your own hours, as long as the job gets done flawlessly. All communication is 100% written English. This role starts as part-time, but there is a strong option to transition to Full-Time with a salary increase at the end of the year, depending on our success and collaboration.



Your main focus areas will be:



1. Partnerships & Clinic Outreach (Top Priority): While we sell primarily online, we collaborate heavily with medical clinics and practices. You will reach out to them to offer two partnership options: carrying our product in their clinic, or receiving flyers with exclusive promo codes for their patients. This is not classic "hard sales" – it’s about relationship-building. It requires top-tier organization and tracking skills.



2. Customer Experience (Abandoned Carts): Reaching out via
 to customers who abandoned their carts. Your goal is to understand why they didn't complete the purchase, answer their questions, and gently help close the sale.



3. Business Development: Actively researching, finding new opportunities, and brainstorming creative ways to expand the business.



4. Future Projects (As we grow together): Depending on our synergy, you will eventually take part in: TikTok Shop, Amazon, Affiliate Programs, Loyalty Programs, Community Management, SEO/AEO, building custom AI tools, and AI Image Generation.



Who You Are:

-You are a hungry, hyper-organized VA expert who wants to grow with a brand.

-You have perfect, highly professional written English.

-You are deeply familiar with AI and use it daily to be highly independent.

-You are a proactive problem solver—when you don't know something, you ask AI and figure it out.



The $10 Paid Technical Test:

Shortlisted candidates will be invited to a paid technical test ($10 via PayPal). For this test, we expect you to use "Vibe Coding" and AI development tools (such as Lovable, Claude Code, Cursor, Base44, etc.) to build a custom Task & Time Management Workspace from scratch.

Here is the catch: This system is being built for YOU. We want you to design a dynamic dashboard that is 100% tailored to how you prefer to organize your workflow, manage your daily tasks, and track



Compensation: $3.00 - $4.00 / Hour (Depending on experience) + Year-end raise/Full-Time potential.

+ Gemini pro account



How to Apply (READ CAREFULLY):

To apply for this position, you MUST fill out our dedicated application form here:





Important Rules:

-You can send a message via
 after completing the questionnaire to 
 or right here on OnlineJobs.

-We will ONLY review and consider candidates who submit their answers through the Google Form.

-If your answers stand out, we will contact you directly with the next steps for the paid technical test.

title: CR Tool Developer (Python +
description:
About the Role



We are building an AI-driven platform that analyses bank statements to extract and structure financial data accurately.

We already use Google Document AI (Bank Statement Parser), and we’re looking for a skilled developer to build a robust OCR and data-processing tool that can interpret PDFs and scanned documents with high precision.



Job Overview



You will build an OCR parsing pipeline that can:



Extract data from PDF bank statements (both scanned and digital).



Normalise and clean the data into a standard schema.



Validate accuracy using logical rules (balance continuity, reversals, missing pages).



Integrate the parsed output into our existing backend.



Tech Skills Required



Strong Python development skills (minimum 2 years).



Experience with Google Document AI or other OCR APIs (AWS Textract, Azure Form Recognizer, etc.).



Knowledge of pdfplumber, PyMuPDF, Tesseract, or Camelot for table extraction.



Comfortable building FastAPI or Flask endpoints.



JSON data handling, validation, and schema mapping.



Familiar with Google Cloud Platform (API keys, credentials, storage).



Excellent attention to detail and testing discipline.



Your Deliverables



End-to-end OCR tool (upload ? parse ? output JSON/CSV).



Fallback logic for scanned PDFs (switch between Google DocAI and local OCR).



Normalised transaction schema with consistent data structure.



Logic that ensures reversals are negative and balances align across pages.



Accuracy and validation report.



Dockerised FastAPI app or API endpoint for integration.



Nice to Have



Familiarity with Supabase or 
v.



Experience parsing financial documents (bank statements, invoices, receipts).



Experience building simple internal dashboards (React/Vue or basic HTML UI).



Salary Range



?40,000 – ?90,000 / month (depending on experience).

Higher rates considered for candidates with proven OCR or Document AI expertise.



How to Apply



Please include the following in your application:



A short paragraph explaining how you would build a highly accurate OCR parser for bank statements.



Examples or GitHub links to OCR or document-parsing projects you’ve worked on.



Your expected monthly salary and availability.

title: Online Tutor (Math / Science / English)
description:
About ETT Outsource

ETT Outsource connects learners and education brands with high-quality online tutors and teachers across all subjects. We build long-term, reliable teams for online education, from one-to-one tutoring to scalable academic support programs.



The Role

We’re growing our freelance tutor network across core subjects (Math, Statistics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, English/ESL, Writing, Business/Economics, CS/Programming). You’ll deliver clear explanations, step-by-step guidance, and study support via chat and live sessions - helping students understand concepts, practice skills, and build confidence.



What You’ll Do

Provide concept explanations and worked examples tailored to a learner’s level

Run 1:1 online sessions or asynchronous chat support with a friendly, professional tone

Create quick practice items, study notes, and rubrics to reinforce learning

Review student drafts/solutions and give actionable feedback

Collaborate with QA to improve clarity, and learner outcomes



You’re a Great Fit If You Have

Bachelor’s degree (or higher) in your subject area (or strong equivalent experience)

1+ year online tutoring/teaching, academic coaching, or instruction experience

Strong written English; clear, patient communication

Ability to break down complex problems step by step

Professional integrity: zero-tolerance for plagiarism or AI-generated work passed off as original





Hours & Compensation

Flexible - pick shifts or accept projects that match your availability (evenings/weekends welcome)

Paid per session or per project (rate varies by subject level & turnaround)

Performance bonuses for quality, speed, and client satisfaction

On-time payouts via trusted global methods (e.g., Payoneer/Wise)



How to Apply. Click Apply and include:





A short description (up to 150 words) of your writing experience and your areas of expertise

A sample of your explanation on any topic in your major. The explanation should contain
words and be applicable for a Grade 10 student. 

Our team will review your application and reach out with the next steps within 3-5 business days.

description:
Application Instructions:

Read carefully and apply only if you meet the criteria. This position is for candidates aged 26-35 willing to work a Night Shift to align with the US Eastern Time Zone. Attach a detailed CV and relevant work. Previous experience with E-Commerce brands is preferred.



Company Overview:

Decozen, a leading US E-Commerce company, specializes in high-quality Home Decorative Accessories. Our website, 
, provides exceptional products and enhances customer experience. Join our dynamic team in online retail and multimedia content.



Position Summary:

We seek a skilled and creative Amazon E-commerce Graphic Designer cum Video Editor with expertise in designing, producing, and editing multimedia content for Amazon and other e-commerce platforms.



Key Qualifications:

- Bachelor’s degree in Multimedia and Graphic Design.

- Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Sketch, Lightroom, Canva, and other graphic/video design and editing software.

- Strong understanding of image, audio, and video requirements for e-commerce platforms.

- Experience with Zoo
etings, WhatsApp, Dropbox, and Hub staff.

- Study competitors’ media strategies to outperform them.

- Detail-oriented with high-quality standards.

- Creative and analytical mindset for visual trends.

- Positive, proactive personality.

- Organized with sharp attention to detail.

Other Requirements:

This role suits a dynamic professional who thrives in a fast-paced environment and wants to significantly contribute to a growing e-commerce business. We look forward to your skills and expertise driving our Amazon presence.

description:
KeaBabies is looking for a highly creative and detail-oriented Graphic Designer to join our global team. You will work closely with our Senior Graphic Designer in Singapore to create engaging, high-converting product images for Amazon and other platforms.



This role combines design expertise, AI-powered creativity, and e-commerce product research to help us continuously improve our listings and visual branding.



Key Responsibilities:

• AI-Powered Design – Leverage AI tools for image generation, enhancement, and creative concept development.

• Amazon Product Research – Research competitor listings, market trends, and customer feedback with customer focus to spark ideas that enhance listing visuals and content.

• Collaboration – Work closely with the design team to brainstorm creative concepts that resonate with our audience.

• Image Review & Feedback – Assess images for quality, brand alignment, and compliance with Amazon guidelines; provide feedback to improve visual appeal and performance.

Requirements

• Strong portfolio with e-commerce-related projects.

• Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator).

• Open to using AI tools for image generation (e.g., Midjourney, ChatGPT, Adobe Firefly, etc.); prior experience is a plus.

• Experience in e-commerce, especially with USA Amazon listings, will be a big plus.

• Strong understanding of composition, color, and visual storytelling.

• Good research skills and the ability to extract actionable insights from competitor listings.

• Strong organizational and time-management abilities.

• Excellent communication skills for working with a remote, cross-cultural team.

• Experience working with remote teams is a plus.

• Owns a MacOS computer or laptop with stable internet access.

title: UK-Experienced Finance Officer (Full-Time, UK Hours)
description:
About the Role



We're looking for a fully qualified finance professional to join our finance function remotely. This isn't a bookkeeping role — we need someone who understands UK accounting standards, VAT, and management reporting, and can operate with minimal supervision inside our existing systems.



You'll be working alongside our UK-based finance team on day-to-day financial operations: bank and credit card reconciliations, accounts payable and receivable, month-end processes, and maintaining clean, accurate books in QuickBooks Online.



What You Must Have

- A recognised accounting qualification (CPA Philippines is fine, but you must also have demonstrable experience working with UK accounting standards — GAAP or FRS 102). If you've only ever worked in Philippine or US accounting frameworks, this isn't the right fit.

- Hands-on QuickBooks Online experience. Not "familiar with" — actually used it as your primary tool. We'll ask you to walk us through your workflow in the interview.

- Strong reconciliation skills. Bank recs, intercompany, supplier statement recs — this is a core part of the role and needs to be second nature.

- Understanding of UK VAT (including reverse charge where applicable), PAYE basics, and how UK invoicing works.

- Experience working UK hours for a UK-based company. We need someone who's done this before and knows the rhythm works for them.

- Confident communicator in English, comfortable on video calls and Slack with the wider team.



Nice to Have

- Experience with multi-entity or multi-currency environments. We operate across the UK, UAE, and US.

- Exposure to management accounts preparation and board-level reporting packs.

- Experience in professional services or consultancy businesses.



To Apply

Send your CV and a short note (no more than 150 words) answering two questions:

- What UK-specific accounting work have you done, and for how long?

- Describe your QuickBooks reconciliation process — what does your typical month-end look like?

title: CEO Right-Hand & Amazon E-Commerce Manager (A-Player)
description:
Job Title: CEO Right-Hand & Amazon E-Commerce Manager (A-Player)



(up to 40 hours per week | Remote)



About Us: A Brand & An Agency

Natureich is an internationally operating e-commerce company headquartered in Munich. We are not just a successful brand specializing in wooden toys; we are also a rapidly growing Amazon Agency. We help other brands scale their businesses by taking over their Amazon PPC, SEO, and overall e-commerce operations. We offer an intensely professional environment, fast-paced growth, and exceptional development opportunities.



The Opportunity: Ultimate Mentorship

This is not a standard assistant role. You will be the direct right-hand to the CEO, learning to do exactly what he does. You will receive comprehensive, hands-on mentorship, daily calls, and deep training directly from the founder. In exchange for your extreme organization and dedication, you will learn the exact blueprint for running a successful e-commerce brand and a highly profitable agency.



Mandatory Requirement: Proven hands-on experience in E-Commerce and/or Amazon (Seller Central, PPC, or SEO).

The Mission



Your mission is to act as the ultimate force multiplier for the CEO. You will manage his schedule to keep him highly effective, while simultaneously taking on direct operational work for our agency clients (Amazon PPC, SEO, and listings). By flawlessly executing agency contracts, keeping clients thrilled, and radically organizing the CEO’s day-to-day operations, you will reduce his administrative workload by 25% annually, freeing up his time for visionary projects.



Measurable Outcomes (What you must achieve):

A-Players are driven by results. You will be measured on the following outcomes:

1. Flawless Client Execution: Successfully fulfill the contractual hours and deliverables for our agency clients (PPC, SEO, E-com services). Maintain a 95%+ client satisfaction rate by ensuring all work is done accurately and on time.

2. Liberate the CEO’s Time: Reduce the CEO’s operational and administrative workload by 25?ch year. Within 3 years, 75% of the CEO’s time must be freed up for new strategic projects. This involves ruthlessly managing his calendar, filtering
s, and organizing his tasks.

3. Zero Dropped Balls: Build and maintain an airtight task management system. Ensure that 100% of tasks assigned by the CEO to you or the team are completed reliably, thoroughly, and documented without him having to follow up.

4. Drive Financial Growth: Directly contribute to increasing company and agency revenue by 25% per year and increasing the EBITDA margin by 7% by the end of Year 3 through efficient campaign management and process optimization.

5. Team Alignment: Conduct quarterly check-in meetings with tea
mbers to gather feedback, track open tasks, document expectations from the CEO, and optimize internal processes.



Role-Specific Competencies (Hard Skills):

• Amazon & E-Commerce Mastery: Proven experience in Amazon Seller Central, Amazon SEO, and/or PPC advertising. You know how the ecosystem works.

• Extreme Organization & Time Management: You are highly structured. You can plan calendars, prioritize tasks ruthlessly, and manage multiple client projects simultaneously without losing overview.

• Direct Client Work Execution: Ability to work directly inside e-commerce accounts, optimize listings, and manage advertising budgets efficiently.

• Communication: Excellent knowledge of English (spoken and written) for precise communication with clients and the CEO. Good Camera and Internet Connection. 

• Technological & Data Competence: Proficient in using e-commerce tools, task management software, and interpreting data to derive actionable business insights.



Cultural Competencies (Who you are):

• A-Player Mentality: You don't wait to be told what to do; you proactively identify problems and solve them.

• Integrity & Honesty: You do the right thing even when no one is watching. Your words and actions align perfectly.

• Reliability & High Performance: Consistently delivering high-quality work and never missing a deadline. If you say it will be done, it gets done.

• Obsession with Optimization: You strive to make improvements every single day. Not a day goes by without optimizing a process, a product, an ad, or your own workflow.

• Detail-Oriented: You care about the small things just as much as the big picture.



Position Details:

This position can be filled as a freelance role, with flexible working hours.

Interested in learning more about our company?

Feel free to visit our website at 
.



To Apply:

Please send your resume and a brief cover letter to Mario Moosbauer at 
 In your cover letter, please explicitly state a specific example of how you successfully organized a complex project or managed Amazon/E-com tasks in the past.



We look forward to hearing from you!



Natureich

Ainmillerstrasse
München, Germany

title: Senior Bookkeeper *Superstar Only*
description:
We are looking for two experienced bookkeepers to join our finance team and take ownership of expense categorization, transaction reconciliation, accounts payable, and invoice processing across multiple legal entities.



The bookkeepers will work closely with the CFO, ensuring that all financial transactions are accurately recorded, categorized, and reconciled on a regular basis. This role is ideal for someone who is detail-oriented, organized, and comfortable managing financial data across multiple platforms — including Xero, Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and our custom CRM.



Key Responsibilities

- Categorize all expenses and transactions in Xero, ensuring accurate classification for reporting and compliance

- Reconcile transactions across multiple payment platforms, including Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRM tools

- Manage accounts payable, ensuring all invoices are properly reviewed, recorded, and scheduled for payment

- Assist with invoice processing, ensuring all vendor invoices are accurately documented and match purchase orders where applicable

- Work closely with the CFO to provide up-to-date financial records for monthly, quarterly, and annual reporting

- Ensure all financial data is accurate and properly organized to support compliance across multiple jurisdictions

- Flag discrepancies or unusual transactions for review by the CFO



What We’re Looking For

- At least 5 years of experience in bookkeeping and expense reconciliation

- Strong proficiency in Xero

- Experience working with Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRMs

- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

- Experience handling multi-entity, multi-currency financial data preferred

- Comfortable working in a remote-first environment

- Fluent in English, both written and spoken



Requirements for Effective Remote Work

- Reliable computer or laptop capable of photo and video editing

- Stable high-speed internet connection

- Conducive work environment



Working Schedule

title: AI Video Editor - Full-Time | Remote | Long-Term
description:
We Don't Want "Good." We Want DANGEROUS.



We're a fast-moving digital marketing company generating millions in revenue, and we need a video editor who lives and breathes AI video tools. Not someone who "knows a little Canva." We need someone who wakes up excited to push the boundaries of what's possible with AI-generated video content.



If you're the person your friends come to when they want to know what the latest AI tool can do... keep reading.



What You'll Be Doing



- Creating scroll-stopping video ads for
, Instagram, TikTok & YouTube

- Using AI video generators like Sora 2, Veo 3, Kling, Runway, Minimax, Hailuo and whatever drops next week - because something always does

- Producing UGC-style content, talking head videos, product demos, and direct response video ads

- Combining AI footage with traditional editing to create content that converts (not just looks cool)

- Rapid-fire creative testing - we move fast and produce volume

- Turning rough concepts and scripts into polished, high-converting video assets

- Staying ahead of the curve on every new AI video tool, technique, and workflow



You're a Perfect Fit If You...



? Are already obsessed with AI video tools - you don't need to be told to experiment, you can't help yourself

? Have strong traditional editing skills (CapCut, Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or After Effects)

? Understand direct response marketing - you know the difference between "pretty" and "profitable"

? Can produce high volumes of quality creative without sacrificing standards

? Are resourceful and proactive - you solve problems before anyone knows they exist

? Communicate clearly and consistently (English proficiency required)

? Have a reliable internet connection and a machine that can handle the workload

? Are hungry to grow, learn, and level up every single week



Bonus Points For...



? Experience creating ads for health, supplement, or info-product niches

? Familiarity with
 ad creative best practices

? Experience with AI image generators (Midjourney, Flux, Leonardo)

? Basic motion graphics / animation skills

? Understanding of hooks, pattern interrupts, and scroll-stopping techniques



What We Offer



- Consistent, long-term work - this is not a one-off project, this is a career

-Performance bonuses when our creatives crush it

- Access to all premium AI tools - paid subscriptions on us

- A team that values skill and hustle - no corporate politics, no micromanagement

- Room to grow into a creative lead role as we scale

- 13th month pay & paid time off



How to Apply (READ THIS - Seriously)



Do NOT send a generic "I am a hardworking Filipino" message. We get hundreds of those. Stand out.



Your application MUST include:



1. Subject line: "I'm Your Next Creative Weapon" (so we know you read this)

2. A short intro (3-5 sentences) telling us why you're the one

3. Links to 2-3 video samples... ideally ads or marketing content. AI-generated work is a HUGE plus.

4. Name 3 AI video tools you've used and tell us which one is your favourite and why

5. Your honest salary expectation



Applications without these will be ignored. No exceptions.



We review every qualified application personally. If you're as good as you think you are, we'll find you.



Let's build something incredible together. Apply now. ????

title: Head of Customer Service & Operations Lead
description:
- Philippines (Remote) | Full-Time

- Supporting US-Based Sales Team | Licensed NCAA, NBA & Pro League Apparel



Varsity Base is a fast-growing, U.S.-based customizable licensed apparel company specializing in premium letterman jackets and licensed collegiate & professional sports apparel.



We are entering a rapid growth phase with new NCAA, NBA, and other professional league licenses — and we need a serious operator in the Philippines to step into a leadership role.



This is not a basic customer service job.



This is a career opportunity to become the operational backbone of a scaling international apparel company.



The Role



We are hiring a Senior Customer Service & Operations Lead who will:

 • Lead and oversee our existing Philippines-based customer service team (4 reps)

 • Support US sales reps with operational coordination

 • Manage complex and large orders requiring multi-party communication

 • Handle non-standard customer cases using critical thinking

 • Improve and design SOPs for a scaling licensed apparel business

 • Own Zendesk workflows, automation, reporting & performance tracking

 • Reduce escalations to CEO by solving problems independently



You will start as a senior rep to fully understand our workflows, products, and standards — then transition into a leadership role based on performance.



Who This Is For



This role is ONLY for someone who:

 • Has proven leadership experience in customer service (e-commerce required)

 • Has deep, hands-on Zendesk expertise (automation, macros, triggers, reporting)

 • Has experience handling complex / high-value / bulk orders

 • Understands international logistics and factory communication

 • Has written and improved Standard Operating Procedures

 • Thinks independently and makes decisions without constant escalation

 • Is calm under pressure and structured in communication



If you are looking for a basic CS job — this is NOT for you.



If you want to help build a global licensed apparel brand — keep reading.



What Success Looks Like



Within 6–12 months you will:

 • Fully manage the PH customer service team

 • Reduce CEO escalations by 80%+

 • Implement improved SOPs for edge cases and large orders

 • Improve Zendesk efficiency, first response time, and CSAT

 • Act as operations support bridge between:

 • US Sales Reps

 • Customers

 • Factory / Production

 • Design Team



Compensation

 • Competitive fixed salary (based on experience)

 • Performance-based bonuses tied to KPIs such as:

 • CSAT

 • First Response Time

 • Escalation Reduction

 • Ticket Resolution Efficiency

 • Large Order Accuracy & On-Time Processing



This is a long-term leadership opportunity with growth potential.



APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS (MANDATORY)



To apply, you MUST submit:

 1. Your CV

 2. A short video (up to 1 minute) answering:

 • Why are you a strong fit for this leadership role?

 • What experience do you have with Zendesk?

 • Why do you want to work with Varsity Base?



Before recording your video:

Review our website: 



Applications without a video will NOT be considered.



Important

 • Only candidates with prior leadership experience should apply.

 • Only serious applications will be reviewed.

 • This is a high-responsibility role during a major growth phase.

 • We are building a licensed global apparel brand — standards are high.



If you believe you can lead, think critically, and build systems inside a scaling international company, we want to hear from you.



Apply now.

title: Junior or Senior Video Editor
description:
*** Please read through the entire post before applying.  Thanks! ***



*** Company Description ***

Engage Video Production (EVP) creates educational and communication focused video content, primarily for aerospace, defense, and technical clients. Our work helps high stakes organizations explain complex ideas clearly, train teams effectively, and communicate with absolute precision. We operate with a military grade standard of excellence and are looking for a Junior/Senior Video Editor who is ready to grow within a high accountability environment.



While aerospace and defense are our core specialties, our projects vary widely. We need an editor who is adaptable, technically proficient, and comfortable shifting styles to meet the specific goals of a diverse client base.



*** The Three Pillars of Success at EVP ***

To succeed here, you must embody these three core values:



Discipline: You follow through on every task without "floundering" or ghosting. You possess the self-discipline to manage your time and meet deadlines without constant supervision.



Motivation and Dedication: You are dedicated to the mission and the company's growth. You don't just "do a job"; you look for ways to contribute to the overall success of the team.



Radical Integrity and Accountability: You own your mistakes immediately. You have the backbone to point out errors for correction, even if they are your own, because you understand that precision is non-negotiable.





*** Role Overview *** 

We are seeking a Full-Time Video Editor to join our team. This is a stable, 40-hour-per-week role. You will be responsible for executing the editing of active projects under the guidance of our Creative Director.



The ideal candidate can work independently on assigned tasks, manage massive amounts of data, and communicate proactively. We are looking for a professional who takes pride in technical accuracy and understanding how a project’s storytelling can achieve success for our clients.





*** Core Responsibilities ***

Video Editing: Execute the editing process for short- and long-form video content from start to finish, ensuring high-quality storytelling and pacing for all client projects.



Media Management: Organize, sync, and manage large volumes of footage. You must be comfortable handling projects ranging from hundreds of gigabytes to multiple terabytes.



Technical Finishing: Perform professional color correction and grading on all deliverables. This includes managing RAW workflows and ensuring visual consistency.



Audio & Sound Design: Integrate music, perform basic audio cleanup/mixing, and ensure sound design aligns with the project’s goals.



Visual Polish: Apply motion graphics, titles, and lower thirds as required by the project scope to create a polished, professional product.



Feedback & Coordination: Implement revisions efficiently and meet agreed-upon deadlines. You will coordinate daily with the Creative Director and, when applicable, other freelancers or editors.





*** Required Qualifications ***

Professional Background: Demonstrated experience in video editing (freelance or agency). You should have a solid understanding of editing pacing, storytelling, and professional delivery formats.



Software Proficiency: High proficiency in DaVinci Resolve or Adobe Premiere Pro. While Resolve is our preferred NLE, we welcome expert Premiere editors who can deliver professional results.



Technical Foundations: Strong grasp of audio cleanup and mixing, as well as color correction and grading workflows.



RAW Workflow (Preferred): Experience editing and color grading RED RAW footage. If you haven't handled RED RAW, you must be a fast learner capable of managing complex, high-resolution media workflows.



Data & Infrastructure: A reliable, high-speed internet connection is non-negotiable. You will regularly receive hundreds of gigabytes to terabytes of footage and must be comfortable managing that volume of data.



Autonomy & Communication: Excellent written English and a proactive approach to reporting. You must be able to work independently without micromanagement and remain vocal about timelines, challenges, and progress.





*** Bonus / Preferred Skills ***

Motion Graphics: Experience with Fusion, After Effects, or equivalent tools for adding visual layers.



Graphic Design: Ability to create images, maps, diagrams, simple layouts, or visual explainers for complex concepts.



Industry Experience: Previous experience with educational, corporate, or technical content.



Collaboration Tools: Familiarity with structured feedback and client-facing revision workflows (specifically experience with 
).



Subject Matter Interest: A genuine interest in aerospace, defense, science, or complex technical subject matter.





*** Compensation ***

Starting at: $640 (~36,800 PHP) to $1,120 (~64,500 PHP) USD per month, based on 40 hours/week, subject to change. 



Starting Rate: $4.00 to $7.00 USD per hour.  [*Conversions are approximate.]



Rate Determination: Starting salary/rates are dependent upon experience and demonstrated skill.





A Note on AI and Judgment

At EVP, we use advanced tools every day. However, this role requires high level human judgment and Radical Integrity. We are hiring a human, not a prompt. If you use AI to draft your personal responses on the “How to Apply” section, you are failing the first test of this role: Honesty. We want to hear your real thoughts and see your real personality to ensure you will be a good fit on our team. If your application lacks a unique human voice, it will be discarded. Use AI to assist your workflow later; do not use it to represent your character now.



*** How to Apply ***

To be considered, you must follow these steps exactly. Attention to details is a requirement for this role.



-Change your subject line to: "Motivated Video Editor – [Your Name]".



-Must use a minimum of 7 apply points (AP)



-Provide a link to your best and most current video editing work (to include any additional skills you want to highlight, such as motion graphic heavy editing, etc.)  No portfolio = no consideration.



-In exactly two sentences, describe your experience  level with RED RAW footage? If none, how do you plan to manage the learning curve and hardware demands of high-resolution RAW media?  Use plain English; no AI-generated fluff.



-Attach or link to your CV/resume.  Must be in PDF format only.



-Want to really stand out? Record a 60-second video (Loom or similar) introducing yourself. Tell me why you are the right pick and what about Aerospace & Defense interests you. Start the video by addressing me by name (Ryan). Applicants who include this video move to the top of the list.



Thanks for your time and genuine interest!

tion.site/c437ba467e7e4c9a917323f4730be347?pvs=105



POSITION
