(9) Marketing, Design & Video: Do you have experience with online marketing, creating content using Canva, or producing short video clips such as
 Reels or similar platforms? Please describe your skills and provide samples of your previous work if available.



(10) Fit, Skills & Experience: Briefly introduce yourself and explain why you would be a good fit for this role. Include what you believe is most important when handling spa clients over the phone, especially during complaints, and what other skills or areas you have a lot of experience in.

title: UI/UX Designer (Off Shore | Long-Term | Product Based Role)
description:
We are building a fast-scaling, multi-vertical property technology platform preparing for national launch. Our product is designed to modernise and automate how people buy, sell, and manage property.



We are now seeking a part-time UI/UX Designer (approx. 80 hours per month) to work with us on a long-term basis as we refine and expand the platform.



About the Role



You will:

- Refine and elevate existing Figma designs

- Improve UX flows across web and mobile

- Design new feature screens and product modules

- Maintain design consistency and strengthen our design system

- Work closely with the founder and development team



This is not agency-style churn work. You will be contributing to a serious, growing product with long-term direction.



What We’re Looking For

- 5+ years experience in UI/UX design

- Strong Figma proficiency

- Experience designing dashboards, marketplaces, or SaaS platforms

- Clean, structured, modern design style

- Strong understanding of UX logic, hierarchy, and user flows

- Detail-oriented and able to think independently



Ideal Candidate

- Comfortable improving an existing design system (not starting from scratch)

- Understands product thinking, not just aesthetics

- Responsive and reliable

- Able to work consistently ~80 hours per month



To Apply, please complete the following Google Form:





We are looking for someone who wants to grow with a product, not just complete tasks.



If you’re serious about building something long-term, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Executive Assistant (Operations & Growth)
description:

mbers

???? Compensation

title: Financial & Business Operations Associate (Part-Time )
description:
Part-Time | Growth-Oriented Venture Role



Job Overview



Capacity: 8–10 hours per week initially



Location: Primarily remote (Philippines-based)



Travel: Occasional domestic site visits (expenses covered)



Focus: Venture evaluation, operational structuring, and international coordination



About the Role



I am building and testing several early-stage business initiatives in the Philippines and am seeking a sharp, analytical professional to help evaluate and structure them.



This is not a standard bookkeeping role. This is a venture evaluation and operations role for someone who wants to understand how businesses are tested, improved, and scaled from the ground up.



The initial assignment involves evaluating a small agricultural venture in the Visayas-Mindanao region. There are minimal formal records in place.



Your task will be to determine:



Is this venture economically viable?



What are the true unit economics and cost drivers?



Should we scale, improve, pivot, or discontinue the project?



Growth Pathway



Beyond the initial farm project, responsibilities may expand into:



Designing structured market research systems for U.S. companies studying emerging Southeast Asian consumers



Organizing workflows and validation processes for AI-driven initiatives



Synthesizing field data into clear reports for U.S.-based stakeholders



Building repeatable frameworks for evaluating early-stage ventures



What You’ll Do



Conduct site visits and convert physical operations into structured financial data



Build simple, practical tracking systems (ClickUp or similar tools are a plus)



Analyze margins, cost drivers, and sustainability



Provide clear, direct recommendations on project viability



Coordinate research and validate information for new initiatives



Work independently and communicate findings concisely



Who This Role Suits



You may be a strong fit if you:



Have a degree in Accounting, Finance, Economics, or Business (CPA welcome but not required)



Think analytically and enjoy solving ambiguous problems



Are comfortable working independently



Communicate clearly across different types of stakeholders



Are curious about international business and technology



Fluency in Cebuano or Surigaonon is an advantage for field work but not required.



Compensation & Location



Philippines-based applicants only



Cebu, Davao, and Visayas/Mindanao candidates preferred for ease of travel



Primarily remote, with occasional site visits (expenses covered)



Compensation is project-based and aligned with an early-stage growth role.

Please include your expected hourly rate in your application.



How to Apply



 

 with:



Your resume



Your location



Your expected hourly rate



A short paragraph explaining why early-stage business evaluation interests you.

mber to support our brand’s growth across digital and offline channels. You will play a key role in processing POs, coordinating marketing campaigns, managing events, and driving strategies that connect with our beauty brand presence.

title: Job Application Specialist
description:
Description:

We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to help submit job applications on our behalf each week. Your primary task will be to apply to 50 targeted job openings per week using the materials and instructions we provide.



Half of the applications will be in the healthcare industry, and the other half will be in technology or finance. We will provide clear instructions, job role details, resume versions, and target companies for each category — your role is to execute accurately, consistently, and on time.



This position is ideal for someone who is dependable, efficient, and comfortable managing repetitive but important administrative work with precision.



Responsibilities:



Apply to 50 jobs per week following detailed instructions and templates



Use multiple resumes and cover letters depending on the role and industry



Maintain an organized record of all applications in a shared Google Sheet



Submit weekly reports summarizing activity and progress



Research new opportunities and job listings that fit provided criteria (optional but a plus)



Requirements:



Excellent written and spoken English



Strong attention to detail and ability to follow instructions carefully



Proficient with Google Sheets, Google Drive, and web-based applications



Reliable internet connection and consistent communication



Prior experience submitting job applications or doing administrative VA work preferred



Basic familiarity with healthcare, technology, or finance roles is a plus



Schedule & Work Expectations:



Flexible schedule — work anytime as long as weekly goals are met



Expected workload: approximately 8–12 hours per week



Must meet the target of 50 completed applications per week



Provide a weekly summary report every Friday



Compensation:



Fixed weekly rate based on performance and accuracy



Bonuses available for consistency and exceptional work quality



How to Apply:



Please submit:



A short introduction about yourself and your experience as a virtual assistant



Any experience you have with job applications, data entry, or recruiting tasks



A link or attachment to a sample spreadsheet you’ve created or managed

title: Credit Repair Disputer
description:
MUST SEND A 60 SECOND LOOM WITH YOUR EXPERIENCE TO BE CONSIDERED FOR POSITION!



Virtual Assistant for Credit Repair and Financial Literacy



Location: Remote



Are you passionate about helping others achieve financial freedom and literacy? We are seeking a skilled Virtual Assistant to join our team and assist clients in disputing inaccurate credit reports and navigating the complex world of credit repair and financial literacy.



YOU MUST RECORD A 2 MIN OR 60 SECOND VIDEO EXPLAINING YOUR KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE ALONG WITH PROVEN RESULTS OF YOUR WORK OR YOU WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED.



Responsibilities:

- Dispute inaccurate credit reports on behalf of clients, adhering to the laws outlined in the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA).

- File complaints with consumer protection agencies such as the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB), Better Business Bureau (BBB), and Attorney General's office when necessary.

- Utilize extensive knowledge of the credit repair process in America to provide expert guidance and support to clients.

- Communicate effectively with clients to address their concerns, answer inquiries, and provide updates on the dispute process.

- Demonstrate true determination and heart in advocating for clients' rights and financial well-being.



Qualifications:

- Previous experience working with a credit repair company, with a strong understanding of the credit repair process.

- Extensive knowledge of the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA) and other relevant laws governing credit reporting and repair.

- Proven ability to file complaints with consumer protection agencies, such as the CFPB, BBB, and Attorney General's office.

- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to empathize and connect with clients.

- True determination and heart to help clients overcome financial challenges and achieve their goals.



Benefits:

- Flexible remote work environment.

- Opportunity to make a meaningful impact in the lives of others.

- Competitive compensation package.



If you have a passion for helping others and possess the skills and qualifications listed above, we want to hear from you! Apply now to join our team and make a difference in the world of credit repair and financial literacy.

title: Landing Page Developer (No-code page builder) – eCommerce (Remote)
description:
Build high-converting landing pages. Work fast. Make an impact.



We are an 8+ year old eCommerce group running multiple online brands, and we’re looking for an experienced Landing Page Developer to join our team.



Your core job will be simple and clear:



To build landing pages with landing page builder apps that support our marketing funnels, and help maintain the online store through updates, optimizations, and fixes when required.



This role is designed for someone who already knows how to build landing pages, understands conversion-focused design, and wants a stable long-term position with a growing eCommerce business.





What we offer

- Salary: $600 USD per month

- Employment Type: Part-time, 20 hours per week (4 hours per day) 

- Location: Remote

- Leave: 10 days of paid time off and 5 days of sick leave annually



Who This Role Is For

This job is perfect for you if:

- You enjoy building landing pages 

- You already have real experience creating pages for eCommerce brands

- You can take a design and bring it to life without hand-holding

- You work fast and take pride in your work

- You want a long-term role instead of random freelance gigs



We are not looking for beginners.



We want someone who can join the team and start making an impact quickly.



Process training is provided





What You’ll Be Doing

As our Landing Page Developer, you will:

- Build and maintain landing pages from provided designs and mockups, including advertorials, listicles, sales pages, promotional pages, and product-focused landing pages.

- Accurately duplicate and implement designs from swipe files and creative references, ensuring pixel-perfect execution.

- Ensure all pages are fully responsive and functional across desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

- Work closely with the marketing and creative teams to launch new campaigns, iterate on pages, and implement updates quickly.





Required Experience & Skills

- Real experience building landing pages for eCommerce brands.

- Hands-on experience with page builders, preferably Gempages (or similar platforms like Replo, Shogun, PageFly, Unbounce, or Webflow).

- Ability to turn mockups into finished pages quickly and accurately, working from Figma files, briefs, and swipe references.

- Strong grasp of responsive design, ensuring pages look and perform perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile.

- High attention to detail and layout fundamentals, including typography, spacing, and visual structure.

- Self-sufficient and fast-working, able to deliver quality pages with minimal supervision.

- Comfortable working remotely with Slack and ClickUp.





Growth Opportunity



This role is built for the long term.

If you perform well, you will:

- Transition to full-time

- Become a core member of our marketing team

- Take ownership of landing page production

- Grow alongside a fast-moving team

- Unlock quarterly performance bonuses



We are looking for someone experienced, reliable, and fast.



If you’re a landing page developer who enjoys building high-quality pages and wants a stable long-term role with an eCommerce company, this is for you.





How to Apply

To be considered, please include:

- Example portfolio of landing pages you’ve built

- Platforms you have experience with (Gempages, Replo, etc.)

- Your current availability

- Short description of your experience with eCommerce pages

- Please submit your responses using this form


 



Important:

Applications without real landing page examples will not be reviewed.

title: Content Manager: Social Media & Web (WordPress + Elementor)
description:
We're not looking for someone who's "pretty good." We need someone who's obsessive about details.



The kind of person who notices when an image is 2 pixels off. Who reads a caption four times before hitting publish. Who finds typos that spell-check misses. If you've been called "picky" or "perfectionist" before—and you took it as a compliment—keep reading.



What You'll Actually Be Doing



Right now, we have two core needs. More will come as you grow with us.



1. Social Media Scheduling in 



Upload posts across Instagram,
, GMB, X, and Pinterest. Add images, captions, alt tags—and make sure everything is polished before it goes live. You'll work inside Sprout Social, which handles all platforms in one place. If you haven't used Sprout, we'll train you. And the skills will make you more marketable if we ever part ways.



2. Web Content in WordPress + Elementor



Place content on pages. Follow our standards for styling, spacing, image handling, and metadata. You’ll also create and categorize pages intelligently. If you've used Elementor before, great. If not, we'll train you—but you need to be comfortable in WordPress already. You do not need to be a designer, but you need to know if something looks good or not. 



That's the work. It's repetitive. It requires focus. And it must be nearly error-free because our clients have zero tolerance for sloppy presentation. We're saying that out loud so you can self-select. If you thrive on variety and hate repeating tasks, or you’re just looking for something to pay you, this isn't for you.



Vital info: In your application, use this phrase somewhere so we know you actually read this: "detail-driven"



We expect general competencies in typing, Google Workspace, Gmail, Google Drive, and all of the other Google Apps. We also expect you to be self-managed and proactive. You should expect that out of yourself as well. 



You may have other VA-type tasks assigned to you as well. We may even need some assistance with AI in writing and running assessments and checks. Have a background in SEO or design? Let us know!



Who We're Hoping to Find



We realize our budget is entry-level. We're not hiding that. What we offer in exchange: real training, meaningful work, and a long-term home if you're the COMMITTED kind of person who grows with the companies you join. We've built this agency on relationships, not revolving doors. If you’re younger and getting going, come aboard. If you’re more experienced but without work, read on…



So who fits?



• A social media manager who wants hands-on experience with Sprout and a more technical workflow.

• A web designer or WordPress builder who wants more exposure to other areas of digital marketing and content strategy.

• A VA or data entry professional looking to level up into WordPress, Elementor, and real marketing projects.

• A project manager or strategist between gigs who wants to get your foot in the door and prove your skills—even if the starting rate is lower than you'd normally take. Come show your value and we may have another place for you. 



If you're motivated, reliable, and obsessively detail-oriented? We want to hear from you.



Requirements

• Equipped with a reliable computer and stable internet connection

• Able to meet via video call 2–3x per week with management (up to 5 the first few weeks)

• Willing to produce brief daily reports in our time-tracking software

• Comfortable learning new industry-leading online tools (we'll train the right person)

• Available 4–8 hours per day, consistently (you can let us know what works for you)



Compensation



USD $3-$4/hour depending on experience (starting). We pay bi-weekly initially to get you some fuel and build trust for the 1st three pay periods and monthly thereafter. There's room to grow as you prove yourself—this is meant to be a long-term fit, not a quick gig.



Want a Long-Term Career?



We take our investments in our partners seriously. Ideally, we’d like this to work ou,t and you continue without agency. Here’s how it works:



We Dance, We Date, We Marry: All independent contractors entering our organization enter into a probationary period of one month, followed by three months (minimum) before we commit to anything longer. We operate in this manner to determine fit, climate/cultural countenance, and to ensure you are in “the right seat on the bus.”



To Apply



Do not reply here with a generic message. We will not respond.



Instead:



Submit your application via this form: 



Then reply here to confirm you submitted the form.



If you only reply here without using the form, your application won't be considered. You’d be amazed at how many people on here don’t follow directions and keep following up.  



Thanks!

title: Video Editor & Animation Artist: Creativity + Philosophy Agency Projects
description:
Seeking the correct person for the right fit.... however that works for both of us, we are open: Full-time, part-time, or even project-based. 



UPDATE: Primarily looking for a full-time, focused individual who is seeking stable, long-term employment. We're not seeking rabbit chasers, 



We have a small and focused marketing agency that works for a few products and personal brands. We need a skilled editor who is also an artist... 



You have high competency in Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and the Adobe Suite... as well as the technicalities of video production, media sizes, audio clean-up, etc. We find the best post-production creatives typically play in many areas, such as photography, design, motion, drawing, painting, etc. Share your passions for us to have a great sense of who you are. 



Ideally, you have a strong portfolio in animation and a good sense of graphic design principles. And you know how to manage files in a professional workflow.



And most of all, you are intuitive and versatile. You know that millisecond when to cut between words... You know how to select an appropriate stock b-roll clip and can choose a song to match the objective. You LOVE having all the tools with flexibility for your creativity to flourish, yet you have a solid track record of moving projects to completion. 



If you primarily stick to lighter tools such as Canva and phone app-based editing programs, we're not a fit. We'll be asking about your computer's specs, your upload speed, and other requirements for more experienced designers. If you also know when and how to use them 



Show us your best work. Looking for portfolios with both animation and editing, but open to people who may have a specialization in one or the other. In terms of animation and design style, our initial project will be with simple, minimal graphics that are intelligently orchestrated with philosophical insights. 



All applicants who we feel may be a fit will be hired for 1-3 paid test projects. We'll invest in seeing if we are a fit because we are determining how much project management and input we'll need to have in the early stages. Ideally, we're looking for someone who wants to grow and evolve with our unique, potent, growing agency for many years. If you're a proactive self-starter who "gets it," write us. 



If you have a friend or two you love working with, we're also open to hiring a team. Pay will be determined on your competency, productivity, and overall efficiency. We are rapidly expanding in video production, so there is an opportunity to start part-time and grow into something greater. 



To Apply: Prepare your portfolio and info. Then follow the instructions below. 



1) You must submit your application via this link: 





2) Reply here to notify us that you've submitted. Note: if you only reply here, you will not get a response and your application won't be considered. We will reply to each applicant who uses the form and let you know if we see you as a fit now or in the future.

title: Amazon PPC Specialist
description:
About the Role:

We're looking for a highly experienced Amazon PPC Specialist to join our growing team. In this role, you'll take ownership of the day-to-day ad management for multiple Amazon seller accounts - including strategy, campaign builds, bid optimization, reporting, and ongoing performance improvement.



You'll work closely with our account team to execute on client goals, join client calls to provide expert insight, and collaborate on strategic roadmaps to drive growth.



Internship / Trial Period:

This position will begin with a paid 60-day internship (trial period) to ensure mutual fit. During this time, you will receive compensation while demonstrating your skills, adapting to the role, and integrating with the team. At the end of the 60 days, your performance will be reviewed. Successful candidates will transition to a full-time role under a standard employment agreement.



What You’ll Do:

* Manage Amazon PPC campaigns across multiple accounts (Sponsored Products, Brands, Display).

* Perform ongoing keyword research and bid management.

* Build and optimize campaigns using flat files and internal tools.

* Monitor performance, analyze reports, and create custom reporting dashboards.

* Collaborate with account managers to align PPC strategy with client business goals.

* Join client calls as needed to provide PPC updates and answer questions.

* Proactively identify opportunities to improve results and reduce wasted spend.



What We’re Looking For:

* 3+ years of experience managing Amazon PPC campaigns (agency experience preferred).

* Proven ability to manage multiple accounts and prioritize effectively.

* Strong understanding of Amazon Ads, keyword strategy, campaign structure, and optimization best practices.

* Proficiency with reporting tools, keyword research platforms, and flat files.

* Exceptional English communication skills (verbal and written) — this is a client-facing role.

* High level of organization, attention to detail, and accountability.



Bonus Points For Experience With:

* Amazon DSP

* Amazon Marketing Cloud (AMC)

* Google Data Studio (Looker Studio).

* AI prompting and automation tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Scale Insights, or similar).



If you're interested, please don't forget to attach your updated CV in PDF format.

title: Client Success Manager
description:
About XP Strategy

XP Strategy is an Amazon Ads Verified Partner agency founded by Abe Chomali. Since 2016, we've helped hundreds of brands and sellers scale profitably on Amazon through data-driven advertising and strategic account management. Our team works across a wide range of categories and account sizes - from emerging brands to established multi-ASIN portfolios.



We believe that great results start with great communication and strong organization. Our culture emphasizes transparency, ownership, and collaboration - every tea
mber plays a vital role in creating success for our clients.



Why Join XP Strategy

At XP Strategy, you’ll join a results-oriented, collaborative team that values clarity, accountability, and growth. You’ll work directly with clients who trust our expertise, while collaborating closely with experienced PPC specialists who deliver world-class results.



If you thrive on organization, communication, and helping clients win — we’d love to meet you.



The Role

The Client Success Manager (CSM) is the bridge between XP Strategy’s internal PPC team our clients. This role ensures that communication, expectations, and performance stay aligned across all active accounts. You’ll act as the client’s primary point of contact, translating goals and insights into clear tasks for the PPC team, tracking progress, and ensuring timely delivery of results.



This position is ideal for someone with solid Amazon PPC knowledge who enjoys building relationships, managing projects, and keeping teams organized and accountable.



Key Responsibilities

* Serve as the main point of contact for assigned clients, managing ongoing communication and updates.

* Coordinate work between internal PPC specialists and client teams, ensuring clarity on goals, timelines, and deliverables.

* Review PPC reports and performance data to translate insights into next steps or strategic recommendations.

* Track milestones, deadlines, and recurring tasks through ClickUp or similar project management systems.

* Lead or join client calls to provide updates, gather feedback, and maintain strong client relationships.

* Identify potential issues early and proactively work with the team to resolve them.

* Maintain organized account documentation and communication logs.

* Support the continuous improvement of client onboarding and retention processes.



Qualifications

* 2+ years of experience in Amazon PPC or e-commerce account management (agency experience preferred).

* Strong understanding of Amazon Ads metrics and campaign structures.

* Exceptional communication and organization skills - must be comfortable managing multiple accounts and priorities.

* Ability to analyze data and communicate insights clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences.

* High level of professionalism and responsiveness in client interactions.

* Comfortable working independently in a remote, fast-moving team environment.



Preferred / Nice-to-Have

* Amazon Seller Central / Campaign Manager

* Helium 10, AdLabs, Data Dive, or similar analytics tools

* ClickUp or comparable project management platforms

* Looker Studio (Google Data Studio)

* Slack, Zoom, and other remote communication tools



If you're interested, please don't forget to attach your updated CV in PDF format.

title: Web Designer & Page Builder (WordPress + AI Tools)
description:
We're a growing US-based digital marketing agency that builds websites and runs SEO for home service contractors (HVAC, roofing, plumbing, electrical). We need a sharp web designer/page builder who can take AI-generated pages from about 90% to 100% — that last 10% where a real human eye makes the difference.

What You'll Be Doing:



Building out service pages and location pages on WordPress using page builders (Elementor, Divi, or similar)

Working inside 
v (an AI web development tool) to generate and refine pages — you don't need to know it yet, but you need to be tech-savvy enough to learn it fast

Taking rough wireframes, reference sites, or verbal direction and turning them into clean, professional pages that convert

Matching and maintaining brand consistency across multiple client websites

Making design tweaks, spacing adjustments, font/color refinements — the small stuff that separates amateur sites from professional ones

Light image editing (cropping, resizing, basic Canva or Photoshop work for hero images and graphics)

Communicating progress daily and flagging issues before they become problems



What We're Looking For:



2+ years of experience building WordPress websites (send examples or portfolio links — no portfolio = automatic no)

Strong visual design sense — you notice when padding is off, fonts don't match, or a layout feels wrong

Comfortable learning new AI tools quickly (
v, ChatGPT, Claude, etc.)

Reliable internet and a professional work setup

Able to work US business hours (Eastern Time) or have significant overlap

Detail-oriented and self-motivated — you don't need to be micromanaged

Good written English communication



Bonus (Not Required):



Experience with Elementor, Divi, or Bricks Builder

Basic understanding of SEO (page structure, heading hierarchy, internal linking)

Canva or Photoshop skills

Experience working with US-based agencies or clients



About Us:

We're a small but growing agency (RAM Digital) focused on getting real results for contractors. We use AI tools heavily to move fast, but we know that AI alone doesn't produce great work — it takes a skilled human to polish it. If you're the kind of person who cares about the details and takes pride in clean, professional design work, we want to hear from you.

This is a long-term position with room to grow as we scale.



?? HOW TO APPLY (READ THIS — applications that skip this step will be ignored):



Start your application with the word "BLUEPRINT" so we know you read the full post

Include a link to 2-3 websites you've personally built or designed (not agency portfolios — YOUR work)

Tell us in 2-3 sentences: What's the #1 thing most WordPress sites get wrong visually, and how do you fix it?

title: Experienced Bookkeeper (4+ years experience in full cycle role)
description:
We are looking for an experienced bookkeeper who excels in QuickBooks Online and is focused on providing high-level customer service. Sage 300 or Xero experience is an asset, but not required. The ideal candidate will be resourceful, with at least four years of experience managing multiple clients on QuickBooks Online. You’ll be part of a growing team where your expertise will help ensure smooth, accurate financial processes while delivering top-notch service to our clients. This role requires a blend of technical accounting skills, great communication, and the ability to take initiative when needed.



Key Responsibilities:



Bookkeeping: Handle data entry, reconciliations, and financial reporting using QuickBooks Online for multiple clients.

Client Management: Ensure excellent communication with clients, answering questions and addressing any concerns they may have about their financial records.

Resourcefulness: Demonstrate the ability to troubleshoot issues and research solutions independently when needed.

Financial Record Maintenance: Maintain accurate and organized financial records for all clients.



What We’re Looking For:



Experience: At least 4 years of experience managing multiple clients using QuickBooks Online.

Software Proficiency: Strong experience with QuickBooks Online.

Customer Service: A strong focus on providing high-level customer service and a proactive approach to client communication.

Resourcefulness: Ability to think critically and perform research when unsure about next steps or issues.

Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy in maintaining financial records and completing reconciliations.

Strong English Skills: Proficiency in reading, writing, and speaking English is required to communicate clearly with clients.



About You:



You are a highly organized, responsible, and customer-focused bookkeeper with at least 4 years of experience managing multiple clients on QuickBooks Online. You thrive in a fast-paced environment, are self-motivated, and take initiative when faced with challenges. You have a strong commitment to delivering excellent customer service while maintaining the highest level of accuracy in your work.



Application Requirements:



This position starts at 9 am Pacific Standard Time. Please note this time.



When applying, please include answers to the following questions:



Do you have at least 4 years of experience managing multiple clients using QuickBooks Online? Yes or No

Do you have experience with Canadian or US sales tax filing? Yes or No

Do you have experience with Canadian or US payroll? Yes or No

Do you consider yourself resourceful and able to research if you are unsure about how to proceed? Yes or No

Are you comfortable reading, writing, and speaking English? Yes or No



The ideal candidate will be able to work independently, prioritize tasks based on deadlines, and be a great team player.



Position is 40 hours per week.



Compensation based on experience.

title: Video Editor & Image Designer
description:
ABOUT US 

We are a fast-growing DTC skincare eCommerce brand. We are looking for a long-term tea
mber, not a freelancer, who wants to build a stable career with us.



We believe in empowering our team. You will get access (and training!) on premium AI tools like Higgsfield, Gemini, and ChatGPT to make your workflow faster and more creative.



WHO YOU ARE 

We are looking for a "preditor" (Producer/Editor)—someone who understands storytelling, pacing, and marketing, not just button-pushing.



- You possess a "student mindset": You take feedback well, you don't take critiques personally, and you improve quickly. We are looking for someone who wants to learn and grow, not someone who thinks they already know everything.

- You are efficient: You can edit a high-quality 60-second video in 2-3 hours and create a social graphic in 1-2 hours without sacrificing quality.

- You are detail-oriented: You have 0% tolerance for typos in captions and overlays.

- You are tech-savvy: You are excited to use AI to generate ideas and speed up your work.



YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES

- Short-Form Video: Edit engaging Reels, Shorts, and TikToks (15–90 seconds) focused on UGC, products, and trends.

- Long-Form Video: Edit YouTube videos, and VSLs (5+ minutes) with clean pacing and storytelling.

- Engagement: Add animated captions, text callouts, B-roll, and visual hooks to keep retention high.

- Graphic Design: Create static ad creatives, quote cards, thumbnails, and simple motion ads.

- Photo Editing: Retouch, resize, and clean up product/lifestyle images.

- Copywriting: Write and polish short English hooks/headlines for your videos and ads.



TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS (Must Have)

- Computer Specs: You must have a PC capable of editing 4K footage and running Adobe Premiere Pro/After Effects without lag or crashing. (Recommended: 16GB+ RAM, SSD Storage).

- Internet Connection: You must have a reliable, high-speed internet connection (Fiber preferred). You will be required to download and upload large batches of raw 4K video files from Google Drive daily.

- Software: Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro (preferred), CapCut, or Final Cut + Canva/Photoshop/Figma or equivalent.



WHY JOIN US? 

- Day Shift Schedule: Enjoy your evenings and weekends! Work normal PH business hours. 

- AI Training: We pay for the tools and teach you how to use them. 

- Stability: We are looking for a partner for the long haul. 

- Portfolio: Build a portfolio with a professional beauty brand.



Schedule & Pay:

- Mon–Fri, 9:00 AM–6:00 PM Philippine time

- $600/month



HOW TO APPLY (Read Carefully) 

To ensure you are paying attention to detail, applications that do not follow these steps will be ignored.



Please reply to this job post with the subject line: "Creative Editor - [Your Name]" and include the following:

- Your video introduction.

- Your Portfolio: A link to your best work. Please highlight Short-Form Videos (TikTok/Reels).

- Your updated resume.



Hiring Process:

1. Submit Application

2. Shortlisted candidates do a simple creative test

3. Short video interview

4. Job Offer



We look forward to meeting you!

title: Amazon Private Label Product Researcher (Alibaba Sourcing – Market Analysis Specialist)
description:
I am looking for an experienced Amazon Product Research Specialist to help identify profitable products to source from Alibaba and launch as private label products on Amazon FBA.



This role is focused ONLY on product research and market analysis — not online arbitrage, listing creation, or account management.



Your responsibility will be to find product opportunities with strong demand, manageable competition, and healthy profit margins suitable for manufacturing and branding.



Responsibilities:

• Research and identify winning product opportunities for Amazon FBA

• Analyze demand using keyword research and sales data

• Evaluate competition (review count, seller saturation, listing quality)

• Estimate realistic landed cost (product cost + shipping + Amazon fees)

• Provide product research reports with data-backed reasoning

• Avoid restricted, branded, or highly saturated products

• Suggest differentiation opportunities where possible



Requirements:

• Experience with Amazon PRIVATE LABEL product research

• Strong knowledge of Keepa, Helium 10, Jungle Scout, or similar tools

• Understanding of Alibaba sourcing and manufacturing considerations

• Ability to calculate ROI, profit margins, and FBA fees accurately

• Experience analyzing keyword demand and market gaps

• Strong analytical thinking



IMPORTANT:

This position is NOT for online arbitrage or wholesale sourcing. Applicants must have experience researching products intended for manufacturing/private label.



To apply, please include:



1. A brief explanation of your product research process

2. Example of a product you researched and why it was a good opportunity

3. Tools you use for validation



Applications without this information will not be considered.

title: Happy Call Team(CS)
description:
About Haulla

Haulla, a smart waste collection service by Ecube Labs, operates in major U.S. markets including Dallas, Houston, Austin, Denver, and Chicago — with plans for further expansion across North America. We help small and mid-sized businesses across the U.S. find better, more affordable waste solutions.



What You'll Do

The Happy Call Team (CS) is responsible for ensuring customers have a positive experience with Haulla service by analyzing feedback, identifying improvements, and implementing effective solutions. Core responsibilities will include:



- Customer Satisfaction & Retention: Conduct proactive satisfaction checks ("Happy Calls") to verify customer satisfaction and identify potential friction points before they escalate into churn.

- AR & Collection Management: Proactively manage and collect outstanding AR (Accounts Receivable) to improve overall collection rates while minimizing customer attrition.

- Churn Mitigation & Recovery: Identify churn risks during the collection process and implement personalized recovery plans for long-term past-due accounts to encourage service re-entry and long-term loyalty.

- Billing Dispute Resolution: Serve as the primary point of contact for customer billing disputes and grievances, providing swift and effective resolutions that restore service confidence.

- Trust Rebuilding: Leverage positive collection experiences as an opportunity to rebuild trust and enhance the overall customer lifecycle value.



What We're Looking for

- This is a full-time remote position

- Available to work during U.S. business hours (7 AM–3 PM PST), Monday to Friday.

- Strong communication and problem-solving skills

- Native-level English fluency

- Familiarity in CRM tool (e.g., HubSpot) is a plus





Good To Have

- Experience in Collection Agency(Over 3+ years)

- Experience in Call Center

- Language Skills: Proficiency in Spanish is not required but is considered a significant advantage.



What You’ll Need (System Requirements)

- A desktop or laptop computer

- A noise-cancelling headset



Compensation



- Base salary plus performance-based bonuses

- Total earning potential: Php 60,000–130,000+/month

- Performance-based commission structure



Interested applicants may apply through the following Google form :

title: Podcast Guest Booking & Outreach Specialist
description:
Part-Time • Remote • Long-Term Potential

Hours: 10–20 per week to start

Experience Required: Proven podcast guest booking experience



About the Role

We are looking for a Podcast Guest Booking & Outreach Specialist to help secure high-quality podcast appearances for the owner of Big Hearted Breeders, Heather Gibson. 



This role is NOT about editing audio or managing social media.

Your sole focus is researching relevant podcasts, pitching hosts, and booking appearances.



You should already understand:

*What podcast hosts care about

*How to pitch without sounding generic or spammy

*How to track outreach and follow-ups consistently



About Us



Big Hearted Breeders Community is a mission-driven education and wellness brand rooted in the belief that pets can bring real hope, comfort, and healing into homes.



Founded by Heather Gibson—an experienced foster and adoptive parent, pet wellness educator, and advocate for ethical breeding—our work sits at the intersection of animals, mental health, education, and community. Through podcasts, educational programs, live and virtual events, and partnerships in the pet and wellness space, we help families, breeders, and pet lovers make informed, heart-centered decisions that support both human and animal well-being.



We are a values-driven team that cares deeply about:

*Kindness and integrity

*Thoughtful, ethical work

*Clear communication and reliability

*Long-term impact over short-term wins

*We believe in building sustainable systems, telling meaningful stories, and showing up with professionalism and heart. We’re looking for people who take pride in their work, enjoy collaboration, and want to contribute to something that genuinely helps others.



If you’re someone who values purpose, organization, and doing good work behind the scenes that creates real-world impact, you’ll likely feel at home here.



Primary Responsibilities

*Research and identify relevant podcasts aligned with our brand and audience

*Build and maintain a list of target podcasts and hosts

*Write and send personalized podcast pitch
s or DMs

*Follow up appropriately (without spamming)

*Track outreach, responses, and bookings in a simple system

*Coordinate booked appearances and confirm logistics

*Maintain a steady pipeline of upcoming podcast interviews





Required Experience & Skills (Non-Negotiable)

*Proven experience booking podcast guests (yourself or others)

*Strong research skills (finding the right shows, not just big ones)

*Excellent written English and persuasive communication

*Ability to personalize outreach at scale

*Organized tracking of pitches, follow-ups, and bookings

*Professional, respectful communication with hosts





Nice-to-Have (Not Required)

*Experience in wellness, pets, education, or mission-driven brands



What Success Looks Like

*Consistent outreach being sent weekly

*A growing list of booked podcast appearances

*Clear visibility into outreach and booking status

*Quality podcast placements that align with the brand



Compensation

*Hourly based on experience

*Competitive for proven results

*Performance-based increases possible as bookings grow





Who This Role Is Best For

-This role is ideal for someone who:

-Enjoys research and relationship-based outreach

-Understands podcast culture and host expectations

-Is persistent, organized, and detail-oriented

-Wants ongoing, flexible, part-time work with growth potential



How to Apply

Please include:

*A brief description of your podcast guest booking experience

title: Senior Bookkeeper
description:
We’re Hiring: Senior Bookkeeper (Remote | PH Time)



Are you an experienced accounting professional who enjoys working with numbers, systems, and meaningful financial insights? This could be your next career move. We’re looking for a Senior Bookkeeper to join our growing team and be part of a supportive, collaborative work environment where your expertise is truly valued.



What we offer:

Fully remote work set-up

Day shift schedule (PH time)

Vacation Leave

Sick Leave

Birthday Leave

Annual salary increases

13th-month pay



What we’re looking for:



At least 5 years of solid accounting or bookkeeping experience

Strong proficiency in QuickBooks Online (certification is a plus)

Excellent Excel and analytical skills

Strong organizational and time-management abilities

High attention to detail and accuracy

Experience with tools such as Fathom, Gusto, Divvy, 
, or Karbon (highly preferred)

Solid knowledge of bank and credit card reconciliation, journal entries, balance sheet reconciliation, financial reporting, and month-end close

Ability to interpret and analyze financial statements

Can start as soon as possible

Background in an accounting or bookkeeping firm is an advantage



What you’ll do:

Manage and review data exports across platforms for revenue, payroll, and accounts receivable

Ensure accuracy and completeness of financial records

Perform bank and credit card reconciliations and prepare monthly reports

Deliver accurate and timely monthly financial statements

Maintain well-organized and up-to-date accounts

Gather and review financial data for reporting and analysis

Support revenue mapping and data migration to QuickBooks Online



If you’re looking for a stable, remote role where you can grow professionally and make an impact, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now by submitting your resume — we look forward to connecting with you!

title: Senior Automation & Systems Specialist [GoHighLevel]
description:
Underpaid, Under-Appreciated, And Unfulfilled?

Your GHL Automations & Operations Skills Deserve More Than “Just Another Job”



You’re Not “Just a VA”

And deep down… you’ve known that for too long



There’s something different about how your mind works.



You don’t just follow instructions and complete tasks



You see how everything connects - Like Neil from the Matrix.

You notice inefficiencies others overlook.

You question why systems are structured the way they are.

You think in patterns. In logic. In architecture.



When something breaks, you don’t patch it...



You trace it.

You diagnose it.

You fix it properly.



And while you’re grateful for your current role…

You know it doesn’t fully use your capability.



It’s not about complaining.

It’s not about being ungrateful.



You’re loyal. You always have been.

But that quiet restlessness?



That feeling that you could be building something more meaningful?



That’s a sign that you’re put here for more, much more.



And ignoring that feeling doesn’t make it disappear.



THE MISSION BEHIND THE WORK 



We are Australia’s #1 Divorce Prevention & Relationship Recovery Organisation



Specialising in working with men whose marriages are close to breaking down and their families falling apart.



When our systems work properly:



• Families stay together longer

• Children grow up in happier & healthier homes

• Generational damage is prevented

• Lives are genuinely changed

• Communities are stronger



This is not random 'agency work'.

Or working in another ‘coaching business’

Nor is this just marketing automation...



This is infrastructure supporting families in crisis.



Some call it ‘God’s Work’.



We see it as our Mission and Duty



And strong backend systems make it possible!



YOUR WORKING ENVIRONMENT



#1, We respect and understand Filipino culture.



Family matters.

Stability matters.

Loyalty matters.

Being proud of your work matters.



We are building a long-term, structured team environment where:



•Your thinking is valued

• Your improvements are implemented

• Communication is calm and clear

• Expectations are structured

• Growth is real

• Performance increases are real



The Australian Time Zone AEST and working hours are perfectly aligned to support happier and healthier Filipino families.



This is not chaos

This is not micromanagement.

This is stable, consistent, mission-driven work with high standards.



THE ROLE - EXPERIENCED AUTOMATION AND SYSTEMS SPECIALIST 



We are not looking for “a VA.”



We are looking for an Experienced Systems & Automation Specialist.



You will:



• Build and optimise advanced workflows

• Diagnose automation failures and trace root causes

• Design clean tagging and segmentation architecture

• Prevent duplicate triggers and workflow collisions

• Improve CRM clarity and structure

• Integrate Stripe, Zapier, Pabbly, Webhooks and APIs

• QA test before deployment

• Document systems clearly

• Proactively suggest structural improvements



If you enjoy clean systems, logical architecture, this role will challenge and expand you.



WHAT MATTERS MOST FOR US - NON NEGOTIABLE



Critical thinking!



When something breaks, you must be able to:



1. Identify what happened

2. Find the root cause

3. Fix it properly

4. Prevent it from happening again



Silence when stuck is not acceptable.

Communication and ownership are essential.

You will always be met with respect, understanding, and listened to.

There are no mistakes - Only Learnings



WHAT SUCCESS WILL LOOK LIKE FOR YOU



If selected, you will begin with a 30-day paid trial period.



During this time, you will:



• Audit and map our automation systems

• Work closely with our experienced Operations & Systems Engineer

• Learn our workflow architecture

• Identify improvement opportunities



You will be supported.

But you will also be evaluated.



At the end of 30 days, if performance meets expectations, you will be offered:



• A permanent full-time contract

• Stable long-term work

• Ongoing performance-based growth

• Expanded responsibility as your capability grows



IMPORTANT: This is not freelance work!



We have and are expanding our long-term high-performance team.

You will be positioned with A Players - The best of the best, and be paid accordingly.



WE ONLY OPERATE WITH HIGH STANDARDS AND STRONG VALUES



This role requires real experience and knowledge



You must be comfortable:



• Diagnosing complex workflow failures

• Understanding automation sequencing logic

• Identifying trigger conflicts

• Designing scalable systems

• Explaining your thinking clearly



If your experience is surface-level, it will become clear VERY quickly.



The work we do impacts families in crisis



Leads cannot fall through cracks.

Systems cannot break silently.



There is too much at stake for 'guesswork' or 'winging it'.



APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS [Important]



At the top of your application, write: ARCHITECT777



Applications without this word will not be reviewed.



In your application, include:



1. A short explanation of a complex workflow you built



2. A screenshot of a workflow with conditional logic



3. A description of a system issue you diagnosed and permanently solved



4. Your expected monthly salary (USD) based on full-time commitment

[We compensate based on capability, performance and long-term alignment]



FINAL NOTE: 



If you’re simply looking for another job, someone easy to do…

This probably isn’t it.



But if you’re looking for:



• Meaning

• Stability

• Growth

• Respect

• A mission to give you purpose 



Then we’d love to hear from you

Founder - Leonidas Sheed

title: Graphic Designer — Fitness & Lifestyle Brands
description:
About the Company

We are Relentless Brands, a US-based health and wellness company operating three growing brands: ISI Elite Training (60-location fitness franchise), The Plunge House (cold plunge and recovery franchise), and Human Nutrition (performance nutrition brand). We are a fast-moving team that takes health and fitness seriously — and we want a designer on our team who does too.



About the Role

This is a remote, work-from-home position open to candidates based in the Philippines. We are looking for a graphic designer who is genuinely passionate about health, fitness, and wellness — not just someone who can design for it, but someone who lives it. Your passion should show in your portfolio and in how you talk about your work.

We are starting with a project-based trial — 12
 designs for an active campaign. If the quality is strong and we work well together, this grows into a full-time, long-term remote role.



Your Responsibilities



Design
 campaigns, social media graphics, digital ads, and marketing materials across three brands

Follow brand guidelines and maintain visual consistency across ISI Elite Training, The Plunge House, and Human Nutrition

Execute designs quickly with minimal revisions based on clear briefs

Collaborate with our US-based marketing team and communicate proactively

Meet deadlines consistently — we move fast and need someone who does too





Requirements



2+ years of graphic design experience

Portfolio that includes health, fitness, wellness, or lifestyle brand work — this is required, not preferred

Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator) and/or Canva Pro

Strong English communication skills (written and verbal)

Able to work and be available during US business hours (full or partial overlap)

Reliable internet connection and own equipment





Preferred But Not Required



Experience with
 design and platforms like Klaviyo or Mailchimp

Video editing or basic motion graphics

You personally work out, train, or are active in health and wellness — this matters to us





Compensation



Competitive rate based on experience and portfolio quality

Starting as a project-based engagement with strong potential for full-time

Long-term opportunity for the right person across a growing multi-brand company





How to Apply

Please send the following:



Your portfolio — must include fitness, health, or wellness design work

A short note (3–5 sentences) about your personal health and fitness lifestyle

Your monthly or hourly rate and your availability to start



We review applications quickly. Strong portfolios get fast responses.

title: Social Media Manager - Real Estate
description:
Seeking a highly motivated and creative Virtual Assistant to spearhead social media for our growing real estate business.



We are looking for someone who understands branding, storytelling, and strategic content creation — not just posting. Our goal is to attract qualified web leads, increase brand awareness, and grow our presence across multiple platforms.



Key Responsibilities:



Develop and execute a cohesive social media strategy



Create and edit engaging content (Reels, short-form video, graphics, captions)



Post and schedule content consistently across Instagram, YouTube, TikTok,
, LinkedIn, and other relevant platforms



Research and implement trending SEO keywords and hashtags



Optimize content for reach, engagement, and lead generation



Monitor analytics and adjust strategy based on performance



Maintain brand voice, aesthetics, and messaging consistency



Ideal Candidate:



Experience in real estate marketing (preferred)



Strong understanding of Instagram, YouTube Shorts, and TikTok growth strategies



Skilled in video editing and short-form content



Knowledgeable in SEO and social media trends



Proactive, organized, and results-driven



Fluent in English with strong communication skills



Our goal is long-term growth, brand authority, and consistent lead generation. If you believe you are a great fit and can help us elevate our online presence, we would love to hear from you.



Please include examples of past work and results achieved.



We look forward to connecting.

title: Collections Agency Operations Manager
description:
Job Overview:



We are looking for an experienced U.S. Collections Specialist with proven, hands-on GoHighLevel (GHL) experience to manage the full end-to-end collection process for U.S.-based accounts. This role requires direct experience working in a U.S. collection agency environment, deep knowledge of U.S. debt collection regulations, and the ability to independently manage accounts from intake through resolution.



The ideal candidate is highly organized, compliance-driven, and comfortable using GoHighLevel daily to track accounts, automate follow-ups, and manage communication workflows.



Note: We’re only processing applications submitted through the form.

Form link: 



Key Responsibilities:



-Manage the full-cycle U.S. collections process, including:

-Client onboarding and account intake

-Skip tracing and debtor research

-Outbound and inbound collection calls, SMS, and
 follow-ups

-Negotiating payment arrangements and settlements

-Payment posting, reconciliation, and documentation



Note: We’re only processing applications submitted through the form.

Form link: 



Hands-on daily use of GoHighLevel (GHL) to:



-Manage pipelines and account stages

-Automate SMS,
, and call workflows

-Log all debtor communications accurately

-Generate reports and track collection performance

-Ensure strict compliance with U.S. federal and state regulations, including FDCPA and TCPA

-Maintain accurate notes, call logs, and payment histories

-Prepare and submit client-ready reports on collection status and performance

-Identify workflow improvements to increase recovery rates and operational efficiency



Note: We’re only processing applications submitted through the form.

Form link: 



Required Qualifications:



-2–3+ years of U.S. collection agency experience (consumer and/or commercial)

-Hands-on, working experience with GoHighLevel (GHL) — required

-Strong knowledge of U.S. debt collection laws (FDCPA, TCPA, and state regulations)

-Proven experience negotiating payments and handling objections

-Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

-High attention to detail and strong documentation habits

-Ability to work independently in a remote environment



Note: We’re only processing applications submitted through the form.

Form link: 



Preferred Qualifications:



-Experience managing multiple U.S. client accounts

-Familiarity with credit reporting, dispute handling, and charge-off accounts

-Experience setting up GHL workflows, automations, and pipelines

-Prior experience in a remote or offshore collection team



Note: We’re only processing applications submitted through the form.

Form link:

title: Sales Representative
description:
Join a fast-growing US online home goods retailer and enjoy the learning and opportunities that you have while working with us.



We strive to provide 5-star service & shopping assistance to all of our clients, and all of our team is accountable to fulfill this.



We are looking for a Sales Representative who can assist prospective buyers and close online ecommerce sales.



We're only looking for full-time, long-term, ongoing cooperation.



Work schedules available:

8 AM to 4 PM US EST

4 PM to 12 AM US EST



Your work week will be 5 days per week, with 2 days off per week. Days off will be selected with your manager. We will try to accommodate your preferences for which days you like, based on availability.



This role starts ASAP!!



Job Duties and Responsibilities:

Receive incoming phone calls and live chats from potential customers (prospects) who indicated that they need shopping assistance. This does not include calls and chats from existing customers that need help with their orders (that’s a job for a different department)

Makes follow-up calls, writes follow-up
s, and text messages to potential buyers. We try to follow up 5x with each person that contacted us (unless they indicate that they are no longer interested). We don’t do cold calling. Only reaching out to prospects who interacted with our online store and left their contact information.

After each interaction with a prospect/customer, writes notes & comments in our CRM (Asana)

Communicate efficiently and build rapport with potential customers

Assists prospects in their shopping journey and helps make the purchase decision

Ensures that all prospects’ questions and objections are addressed

Leads every interaction to a close sale, which means an order is placed on our online store

Prepares custom quotes, price matches competitors if necessary, and offers custom discounts. This requires calculating margins & ensuring profitability.

Answering questions about the products we offer, including technical questions. Learns the specifications, features and benefits of our bestsellers. Over time, becomes an expert in the industry.

If not able to answer product-specific questions, conducts research in the materials provided by the supplier, or reaches out to the supplier to get the information

Confirms stock availability and lead times when offering products to prospects

Documents standard procedures and best practices in a written form, so that other tea
mbers can learn from them



Requirements:

At least 2 years of experience in sales on the phone

Experience must include both inbound and outbound sales

Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

Experience in Customer Service on the phone is a nice to have

Experience in the e-commerce (online shopping) industry is nice to have

Home improvement, construction, and gas plumbing industry experience is a plus

Outgoing, friendly, and lively

Can-do mindset, with a sense of ownership, pride in your performance, and its impact on the company’s success

Long-term commitment - treat this as your career



What we can offer:

Sales commission: 8% of gross profit from all orders closed. Gross profit means the sale amount minus the product and shipping costs. Paid monthly. No upper limit. Monthly commission payouts range between $1,200 (the guaranteed minimum) and as high as $3,000 (for the top performer). The average monthly payout is $1,465 (average from the last 2 years).

$1,200/month minimum guaranteed pay

15 days paid days off per year (also convertible to min. guaranteed commission)

Paid training on all aspects of the role

Opportunities for professional development

Friendly atmosphere

Online Interview process

Fully remote position

title: Personal Assistant Remote USA California time
description:
We are looking for a reliable, organized, and proactive Personal Assistant to support daily business operations.

This is a full-time remote position for candidates who can work during California (PST) business hours.

We are building a structured, process-driven business. We are not looking for a task-only VA — we are looking for someone dependable, detail-oriented, and capable of handling operations consistently.

Responsibilities include:

• Managing CRM (Housecall Pro or similar)

• Following up on unpaid invoices

• Scheduling appointments and coordinating calendars

• Communicating with clients and technicians

• Posting and scheduling content on Google Business and Yelp

• Organizing weekly reports and summaries

• Assisting with administrative and financial tasks

• Supporting daily business operations

Requirements:

• Strong written and spoken English

• Available to work full-time during PST (California) hours

• Experience with CRM systems

• Basic or advanced knowledge of QuickBooks preferred

• Experience managing social media accounts preferred

• High attention to detail

• Reliable internet connection and professional work setup

We are looking for someone who wants stability, structure, and long-term growth.

To apply, please complete our structured application form below:

???? 

Applications without completing the form will not be reviewed.

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Facebook ad Video editor
description:
Video Editor – High-Converting Meta Ads | E-Commerce | Remote

We run multiple e-commerce brands and we're scaling fast. We need a video editor who lives and breathes direct-response — someone who understands that every frame has a job to do, and that job is to sell.

This isn't a creative passion project. It's performance-driven work where your edits are measured against real results — clicks, conversions, and revenue.



What This Role Looks Like



Remote, anywhere in the world

Per-ad compensation — you're paid for output, not hours

5–10 ads per week — fast-paced but sustainable if you have a system

Ongoing work with room to grow as we scale





What You'll Be Doing



Editing short-form video ads (20–60 seconds) built to stop the scroll and drive purchases

Turning raw UGC footage into polished, high-performing creatives

Building strong hooks, tight pacing, and visual storytelling that moves people to act

Sourcing B-roll and reference clips from TikTok, Adspy, and Pipiads

Adding captions, SFX, music, and transitions that feel native to the feed

Using 11 Labs for voiceovers and audio — this is a core part of the workflow, not a nice-to-have

Collaborating on creative angles and scripts when needed

Staying current on what's winning in direct-response and short-form content





You're the Right Fit If:



You have a real portfolio of Meta or TikTok ads — not just general video work

You've edited UGC content specifically, and you know how to make it feel authentic while still converting

You're fluent in CapCut, Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or DaVinci Resolve

You've used 11 Labs in actual client or brand projects

You're familiar with Claude AI for scripting and ideation

You work fast without cutting corners — speed is part of the skill set here

You don't need hand-holding on briefs. You can take a concept and run with it



This isn't for you if you need weeks of feedback cycles, prefer slow methodical editing, or don't have proven ad experience specifically.



How to Apply

Start your message with the word "STORM" — applications without it won't be reviewed.

Then answer the following:



Have you edited ads for an e-commerce brand? Name the product type, your role, and what the ads were trying to accomplish.

Share your portfolio. Which piece are you most proud of — and what made it work?

Walk us through one ad from brief to final cut. What was the challenge, and how did you solve it?

How have you used 11 Labs? Be specific — what projects, what use case, what result?





We move fast and we respond to strong applicants quickly. If your work is good, you'll hear from us.

title: Welcome to K-POP Universe: Office Admin Role (Entry-Level) for E-Commerce – Join the Beat!
description:
- Recruitment validity period: Until 3 business days from the date of the first recruitment announcement

- A PH VA team of more than 5 people has already been formed, and business collaboration is possible using Tagalog in a comfortable atmosphere.

- Providing educational tutorial videos and operating a mentorship program to help new comers quickly adapt



[About Us]

* Company Introduction (Video):

youtu.be/dO2mWWZANx8



[Join Summitree and Write Your K-POP Legacy Alongside Filipinos]

Summitree envisions leveraging their Filipino employees' intelligence and English fluency to expand globally while sharing their passion for K-POP. They highlight the Philippines' crucial role in their expansion plans, emphasizing collaboration with their Filipino team to make a mark in the K-POP world. Joining Summitree means joining a multicultural team (Korea, Philippines, Mongolia, Others) with a shared goal of making K-POP history.



[Responsibilities]

We are looking for a “Full-Time” Office Admin to handle our business.

You will be doing a variety of tasks, almost all of which we will create tutorials for you.

1. Order fulfillment and shipping label generation

You will be responsible for gathering and processing customer orders accurately and efficiently. This includes coordinating with third-party logistics (3PL) providers for inbound and outbound shipments to ensure smooth operations.

2. Product listing and scheduling

As a distributor of K-POP records and merchandise, you will be involved in registering new products into our system. This includes managing inventory, updating product information, and ensuring accurate data entry. Additionally, you will be responsible for scheduling release dates and managing timelines using tools like Google Calendar.

3. Customer service support

providing excellent customer service is crucial to us. You will be responsible for addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Your communication skills and problem-solving abilities will play a vital role in maintaining strong relationships with our valued customers.



[Required qualifications & skillset (must have)]

* Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

* Experience in puchasing K-POP Album or knowledge of K-POP related products (album, merchandise)

* Idea of how to promote K-POP albums and gain traffics in our shopping mall in PH online K-POP community for each artists



[Desired qualifications & skillset (nice to have)]

* Experience in handling customer service

* Experience in Photoshop

* Experience in
 Ads or Google Ads

* Knowledge and Experience of Microsoft Excel & Familar with Using Various Formula

* Experience in experience in Amazon Business (Familiar with Interface and function) or other E-commerce Platform



[Compensation & Employment Terms]

Position Classification:

This is an entry-level position. All candidates, regardless of prior experience, will undergo structured training under a designated mentor to adapt to our internal systems and operational standards.



• Payment Term: Monthly basis

• Probationary Period: 6 months

o Months 0–3: USD 280/month

o Months 4–6: USD 300/month, subject to satisfactory performance evaluation after the first 3 months

o The probation period may be shortened if you demonstrate fast work adaptation and receive an excellent evaluation. (This has occurred in multiple past cases.)



• After Probation Evaluation (Regularization): USD 300/month

o Performance & Total Compensation Structure:

Upon regularization, employees receive a guaranteed 13th Month Pay and at least one annual performance bonus equivalent to one month’s base salary during peak sales seasons. Additional bonuses may be granted based on company performance. When annualized, the total compensation is equivalent to approximately USD 350–380 per month.

o Continued employment and salary maintenance are subject to overall performance evaluation.

o If performance does not meet expectations, adjustments may be made in accordance with company standards.

• Additional Compensation:

o Performance-based incentives may be provided based on work attitude, responsibility, consistency, and overall contribution.



• After Regularization:

o Annual contract renewal is standard

- Salary adjustments may be made based on performance, teamwork, and overall evaluation.

o If overall performance—including work capability, teamwork, reliability, and internal evaluations—is considered outstanding, salary increases may be granted within a shorter period. (This has occurred in multiple past cases.)

o Exceptional performance may also lead to early promotions or salary increases prior to the annual review.



[Perks & Benefits]

1. Regular Employee Benefits

- 13th Month Salary provided

- 10 additional paid leave days upon regularization

2. Performance-Based Incentives

- Additional incentives may be provided during high-performance sales periods

(Example: major comeback seasons for artists such as BTS or Stray Kids)

3. Birthday Benefit (After 6 Months of Employment)

- Receive one free K-POP album of your favorite artist on your birthday

4. Paid Holidays (Regardless of Employment Status)

- January 1st (New Year’s Day) and Christmas Day are paid holidays

- Applies to both probationary and regular employees

5. Long Service Incentive Program

- 1 Year Service: PHP17,000

- 3 Year Service: PHP22,500

- 5 Year Service: PHP28,000



[How To Apply for the job]

Just Fill out 10 Simple Questions through Google Form






Interview via google meet will be conducted after first screening and candidates will be notifed to their
s or
 



Thank you



Human Resource Dept.

Summitree

[Desired qualifications & skillset (nice to have)]

* Experience in handling customer service

* Experience in Photoshop

* Experience in
 Ads or Google Ads

* Knowledge and Experience of Microsoft Excel & Familar with Using Various Formula

* Experience in experience in Amazon Business (Familiar with Interface and function) or other E-commerce Platform



[Compensation & Employment Terms]

Position Classification:

This is an entry-level position. All candidates, regardless of prior experience, will undergo structured training under a designated mentor to adapt to our internal systems and operational standards.



• Payment Term: Monthly basis

• Probationary Period: 6 months

o Months 0–3: USD 280/month

o Months 4–6: USD 300/month, subject to satisfactory performance evaluation after the first 3 months

o The probation period may be shortened if you demonstrate fast work adaptation and receive an excellent evaluation. (This has occurred in multiple past cases.)



• After Probation Evaluation (Regularization): USD 300/month

o Performance & Total Compensation Structure:

Upon regularization, employees receive a guaranteed 13th Month Pay and at least one annual performance bonus equivalent to one month’s base salary during peak sales seasons. Additional bonuses may be granted based on company performance. When annualized, the total compensation is equivalent to approximately USD 350–380 per month.

o Continued employment and salary maintenance are subject to overall performance evaluation.

o If performance does not meet expectations, adjustments may be made in accordance with company standards.

• Additional Compensation:

o Performance-based incentives may be provided based on work attitude, responsibility, consistency, and overall contribution.



• After Regularization:

o Annual contract renewal is standard

- Salary adjustments may be made based on performance, teamwork, and overall evaluation.

o If overall performance—including work capability, teamwork, reliability, and internal evaluations—is considered outstanding, salary increases may be granted within a shorter period. (This has occurred in multiple past cases.)

o Exceptional performance may also lead to early promotions or salary increases prior to the annual review.



[Perks & Benefits]

1. Regular Employee Benefits

- 13th Month Salary provided

- 10 additional paid leave days upon regularization

2. Performance-Based Incentives

- Additional incentives may be provided during high-performance sales periods

(Example: major comeback seasons for artists such as BTS or Stray Kids)

3. Birthday Benefit (After 6 Months of Employment)

- Receive one free K-POP album of your favorite artist on your birthday

4. Paid Holidays (Regardless of Employment Status)

- January 1st (New Year’s Day) and Christmas Day are paid holidays

- Applies to both probationary and regular employees

5. Long Service Incentive Program

- 1 Year Service: PHP17,000

- 3 Year Service: PHP22,500

- 5 Year Service: PHP28,000



[How To Apply for the job]

Just Fill out 10 Simple Questions through Google Form






Interview via google meet will be conducted after first screening and candidates will be notifed to their
s or
 



Thank you



Human Resource Dept.

description:

You will be responsible for seeing when a new client form is submitted and fully onboarding that client, setting up automations, creating communication channels, and tracking progress through a project management system.



This is not a basic VA role — this is a systems and operations position.



Core Responsibilities

 channels for clients

 or similar)

 (Integromat)
